node.description: A single-ivy clad stone chimney stands tall amidst the ruin of several foundations. Scattered stones and wooden rubble lie strewn about the former cluster of homes. Tiny grey mice forage among the weeds that push their way upward between the rocks to reclaim what was rightfully theirs.
A single-ivy clad stone chimney stands tall amidst the ruin of several foundations.

node.name: Dragon's Spine, Swampy Meadow
node.description: An impenetrable briar of dark green bushes laden with bright red and white grackleberries hem in the lakeside trail as it meanders pleasantly through a lush thick meadow.

node.name: Dragon Spine, Muddy Beach
node.description: Pawprints of squirrel, wren, and jay, mix with hoofprints of elk, deer, and moose in the warm soft mud beside the lake. Hundreds of slimy grey tadpoles squirm among the algae-carpeted rocks in the warm still shallows.
Pawprints of squirrel, wren, and jay, mix with hoofprints of elk, deer, and moose in the warm soft mud beside the lake.

node.name: Dragon's Spine, Peri'el's Mere
node.description: Hundreds of bright red ladybird beetles swarm over small rounded boulders and dusty green brush. Red-throated robins swoop down from the forest canopy to feed, only to be chased away by excessively territorial blue jays.
Hundreds of bright red ladybird beetles swarm over small rounded boulders and dusty green brush.

node.name: Dragon's Spine, Hot Springs
node.description: Effervescing pots, pools, and cauldrons lined with bright red, green, blue, and yellow encrustations burble merrily away. Some are filled with thick viscous mud-like fluid while others are crystal clear. A fetid odor overwhelms the area with the distinctive aroma of over-ripe eggs.
Effervescing pots, pools, and cauldrons burble merrily away.

node.name: Dragon Spine, Peri'el's Mere
node.description: Even the ground itself is warm, no doubt in response to the steam-generating heat deep within. A dark black blocky ridge extends outward into the tarn like a finger pointing to its warm heart. About the end of the ridge, the water bubbles and froths violently providing a thick plume of steam that tethers the water to the protective blanket of clouds above.
A dark black blocky ridge extends outward into the tarn like a finger pointing to its warm heart.

node.name: Dragon Spine, Peri'el's Mere
node.description: From on top of the black rock promontory, the depths of the tarn can be seen through the clear crystal water. Far beneath, the obsidian reef dives steeply to the lake bottom that deepens beyond visibility toward a bright orange glow. A large dark shape, deep in the water, scatters schools of trout.
From on top of the black rock promontory, the depths of the tarn can be seen through the clear crystal water.

node.name: Dragon's Spine, Cabin Interior
node.description: The inside of the cabin is a large single room that was apparently divided by function. One corner of the room is filled by a pile of moldy feathers that are covered by a rotting quilt. Shattered crockery fragments litter the ground beside a wobbly table. Dark brown stains splatter the walls.

node.name: Telgi Mod'Sunhin, Platform
node.description: This is a creaking platform that rises twenty feet above the forest floor. The view is much the same as below, except for a small treehouse that stands before you. Its roof is a crazy quilt of tattered cloth, rotted shingles, branches and vines. The walls are dark and splintered, and smoke occasionally seeps out from the cracks.

node.name: Telgi Mod'Sunhin, Enescu's Herbs
node.description: The sagging shelves of this hut are lined with dingy, filth-caked bottles filled with things of indeterminate color, size and shape. Dust balls skid along the splintered floor dizzily. A sputtering fire in a small brazier lends just enough light to the room to make any sensible person wish for complete darkness.

node.name: Biabo's Bug Collection, Front Parlor
node.description: An aged wooden floor is tessellated unevenly while the walls are boarded in dilapidated oak. Large glass display cases sit atop unfired brick stands giving way to an elongated counter. The attendant, Biabo, a middle-aged Gnome, peers over his thick spectacles inspecting a small cricket in the palm of his hand.

node.name: Biabo's Bug Collection, Basement
node.description: Dim candlelight illuminates the roots breaking through the crumbling basement walls. Boxes and barrels are thrown about in disarray making it nearly impossible to navigate through the room. A few more glass cases stand in the corner awaiting the arrival of Biabo's next shipment of insects.

node.name: Dragon's Breath Forest, Through the Break
node.description: Darkness welcomes all visitors who enter here. Amorphous forms lurk around the edges of your vision, forming unnameable shadows that tatter and dissipate when looked at directly. Walls of green curve over and around the trail, forming a living barrier of verdant leaves that shimmer as they drape themselves over the overgrown path to the west. A break in the trees leads back to the main forest.

node.name: Dragon's Breath Forest, A Dark Clearing
node.description: A ring of dark walnut trees stands in ancient vigil over this small clearing, its austere presence contributing to the disquieting silence that seems palpable in this place. The surrounding shadows bring an odd sense of comfort, as every glimmer of light reflected by a polished stone at the locus of the ring breeds the image of a predator lying in wait.

node.name: Jademist River, A Flowered Path
node.description: A small, well-tended path winds its way east, curling close to the rushing river. Roses of a thousand hues guard the way, their silken faces opening to the sunlit skies above.
A well cared for path winds its way to the east, skirting perilously close to the riverbank. Pale white roses bloom in the night air, their silken faces turned skyward.

node.name: Jademist River, Rose Arbor
node.description: Dark blood-roses twine around a wrought iron arch that towers over the way to form an exquisite arbor. The white stone path accents the darkling blossoms, striking a sparkling, fiery nuance into the richly colored petals.

node.name: Jademist River, Garden Path
node.description: To the east the path leads to a small garden, hidden away amidst a small grove of fruit trees. To the west, the way leads back to the fury of the river and the main path.
To the east, the edge of a small garden raises its head, starlight reflecting off tiny white flowers. To the west, the fury of the river drones on behind you.

node.name: Small Orchard, A Quiet Grove
node.description: Fruit trees link hands in a circle to form a quiet grove here. Small flowers spring up around the wicker benches and white ironwood picnic table, creating a place of leisure, where one may sit and repose, thinking about days gone by, and things to come again.

Starfruit trees link hands in a circle to form a quiet grove here. Small, drooping snowdrop flowers spring up around the wicker benches and white ironwood picnic table, creating a place of leisure, where one may sit and allow even the wildest dreams to distill into lucidity beneath the changing moonlight.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Dark Corner
node.description: Littered with odds and ends that have trickled off the surrounding piles, there is perhaps enough room for a large dog to lie down...if the dog were careful. Heat from the composting of the organic materials makes the air oppressively warm and close.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Watchtower
node.description: Passing through the slot cut for it in the floor, the ladder leads into one of the many watchtowers that dot the length of the palisade. Bare of decoration aside from an oil-burning lantern and a small stool, arrow slits slash the walls on all sides, allowing an archer an easy field of fire against invaders, whether outside the Clan or in the bailey.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Bailey Wall
node.description: Tucked away in a small niche formed by the hills of scrap and debris is a tiny building, its construction owing more to the collection habits of its occupant than any blueprint - none of the walls are the same height, the roof looks as if it was borrowed from the hull of a ferry and the oval door bears a definite resemblance to a dining hall table, yet the joints are tightly mortared, the building bears a fresh coat of whitewash and a small, well-tended garden lies along one side.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Great Hall
node.description: Battle standards, representing kin guilds and victories, hang from the plaster and beam ceiling that arches a full two stories overhead. Brightly lit by torches placed at regular intervals along the walls, it is whispered that the floor was laid by Jainder Blackarm himself. At the far end of the room, requiring visitors to walk the length of the hall to approach it, stands an immense chair. Whoever occupies the chair inherits Jainder's legacy and rules the Clan and Guild.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Dancing Pit
node.description: Long generations of Barbarians have used the Dancing pit to test and demonstrate their skills against their guild kin. Clean sand fills the pit, which is twelve strides in diameter and two knuckle lengths in depth as mandated by tradition and is kept raked mirror smooth by the pit master. Long low benches, stacked several high, fill the rest of the room and allow rare and special guests to observe the matches.

node.name: The Broken Blade Tavern
node.description: Thick fragrant rushes on the floor, large comfortable rooms, clean tables and the broadest selection of ales in the province explain why the Broken Blade is famed for both its hospitality and the brewing skills of its proprietor, Amechra Tushise. Weary off-duty guards sit swapping stories and mild insults over a pitcher of Amechra's finest at the far end of the immense bar while, at nearby tables, traders ply local merchants with whiskey in an attempt to squeeze the last gold dokora from their contracts.

node.name: The Broken Blade, Hallway
node.description: A gleaming brass handrail, Amechra's pride and joy, provides support for his less than steady clientele as they traverse the short hallway to their rooms.

node.name: The Broken Blade, Ishar's Suite
node.description: A tiny sitting area, an overstuffed chair and table, just barely qualifies this room for its designation as a suite yet it still manages to be comfortable and inviting. Lace curtains flutter softly at the window, tapestries cover the walls adding splashes of color and a featherbed, easily large enough for three, occupies the remainder of the room.

node.name: The Broken Blade, Corner Room
node.description: Placed where the sloping roof meets an outside wall, the low oak-beamed ceiling is a rather tricky hazard to the tavern's taller guests. Insuring that bare feet won't grow cold, an oversized hooked rug covers the floor and a carved ash rocker sits near a pot-bellied stove. Pushed against the far wall, a brass frame daybed, covered with fat pillows, sits awaiting a tired body.

node.name: The Broken Blade, The Bear's Den
node.description: The plaster walls of this room have been painted with beautiful murals depicting various alpine scenes. On one wall, bear cubs play in an open meadow surrounded by tall pine trees. On another, a full grown bear fishes in a stream. Carved wooden shutters cover the window.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Granzer's Repairs
node.description: The forge of Mastersmith Granzer Wothhome is a model of efficiency and industry. Assistants scurry about, keeping the fires stoked and at peak temperature, while the smith himself, a whipcord Elven man with a commanding presence, shapes the steel that comes hot from the forge.

node.name: Struan's Weapons and Armor, Salesroom
node.description: The Dwarven weaponsmith Struan Arguye keeps careful watch over the shop that sells his creations. The inside of the shop is filled with cheery candlelight that reflects from the walls and the white bearskins covering the floor. A large circle, clear of all obstructions, is set up to allow patrons to practice with an unsharpened version of the weapon they are interested in before buying.

node.name: Struan's Weapons and Armor, Closet
node.description: Small and rather dark, this room appears to store Struan's work samples. Neatly stacked hilts, blunted swords, roughly carved shapes and experimental shields provide an intriguing treasure trove of weaponry.

node.name: Shard, North City Gates
node.description: The massive gates of the city of Shard rise up to the north. The twin doors of steel-braced ironwood give access to the North Bridge across the Lake of Tears. Somber guards watch on the battlements above.

node.name: Shard, East City Gates
node.description: The Eastern Gate is the second most active entrance for the thriving trade of Shard. The looming presence of the Tower of Brickwell dominates the view to the north, a multitude of pennants emblazoned with the arms of many kingdoms, baronies, and other sovereign states flying from its battlements and marking it indelibly as the staging grounds for the Shard Trader's Guild.

Flames from smoky torches mounted on the city's walls flutter in a lakeside breeze and throw a fitful light over the ground, casting shadows on the Eastern Gate. The shadowy outline of the Tower of Brickwell rises up to the north, the faint sound of snapping cloth coming from the Keep's direction.

node.name: Shard, Northwestern Shore
node.description: A muddy path wends its way amidst the reeds which border the shore of the Lake of Tears. To the southeast, the towers of Shard loom above the city walls, gleaming as brightly as a paladin's soul.

node.name: Gondola, Cab South
node.description: Dark brown stains have worked their way into the wooden floor and seats of this small cab, griming up the windows so that the light comes in as a ruddy, dirty color. The faintest trace of some sweetly-sick metallic scent lingers here, just barely detectable, but inescapable. The fresh mountain air tries to push through the sour smell, but the stench remains.

Mottled stains are worked into the wooden floor and seats of this small cab, darkening the windows to a thick black opacity. A spike of chill taints the air, the thinnest strand of some sickly-sweet metallic scent wrapping it.

node.name: Eastern Fields, Path
node.description: A dirt path draws a graceful line through knee-high grasses. A low stile provides easy access through a simply but beautifully carved wooden fence, which borders a road to the west. Grain fields, like a placid lake of green-gold ripples, spread out to the south from east to west as far as the eye cares to wander.

node.name: Eastern Fields, Path
node.description: The level path curves gently around a wind-carved boulder. The fields are laid out in such a manner as to avoid the huge rock, since its smooth planes and odd curves make it a perfect ornament for its setting. Its rightness here in this place is so obvious that none of the farmers would have even considered removing it.

node.name: Eastern Fields, Path
node.description: A light breeze sets the grain fields to rustling in the darkness. One can almost fancy that they're whispering to each other. There's a sense of life all about, gathered and communing in the darkness -- alien, but in no way malevolent.
A light breeze sends rolling waves through the grain fields and sets the stalks waving like upraised arms, as if the grain was worshipping the sun that gives them life.

node.name: Eastern Fields, Path
node.description: An eerie quiet hangs over the swaying fields. No birds call, no insects hum and even the rustling of the grain can be barely heard. It's a waiting quiet, though, as though the moment will soon be right for -- something.

node.name: Eastern Fields, Path
node.description: A fallow field lies to the south. All the way to the far horizon, stray heads of grain share the land with brush, wildflowers and vines. The medley of colors and textures celebrates the reclaiming of this land by nature. Some day the farmers will return and end the idyll with plow and harrow, but for now the meadow rejoices, dressed in its colorful best.

node.name: Fallow Field
node.description: No plow has sliced the ground here for a long time, nor has sickle reaped the grain. The growth is lush, lending an overwhelming sense of life. Nature seems to call from every direction, and the colors and aromas and vividness of life make the world spin until one no longer knows which way is which.

node.name: Gweld Path
node.description: The area is surrounded by large fir trees that block all light from the sun when it is shining. Maiden's Tress vines circle the trees covering most of the valuable bark. Small unknown bushes line a thin path making it difficult to move easily.

node.name: Gweld Path
node.description: A large wall covered in vines blocks any movement to the west. Numerous ant trails cover the wall and the vines. Sickly-green ants move up and down the trails with high efficiency carrying small bits of leaves.

node.name: Gweld Path, Temple Entrance
node.description: The inside of the temple is dark and foreboding. Steps covered in a blood-red moss lead upwards to an obfuscous arch. Worn statues of beheaded animals form a crude circle in the middle. The heads of the statues are piled in a corner surrounded by a large black ring.

node.name: Gweld Path, Temple
node.description: Cobwebs of a gigantic size cover the entire room. No light enters, but you are able to see. Peering closely you are barely able to make out a chair with what appears to be an old man sitting nonchalantly on it. As you move you hear a crunching sound and realize you are standing on ashes.

node.name: Froissart's Tannery, The Supply Room
node.description: The supply room projects an air of quiet efficiency when Froissart is away and hectic activity when he's present. Bottles, paper patterns, and tools stand neatly arranged on shelves that line the room behind a polished wooden counter. Placed squarely in the center of the counter is a vellum catalog.

node.name: Survivalist Supplies, Front Room
node.description: Fragrant pine boughs hang to the ground, sheltering this quiet space from the elements. Flickering light from a fire crackling in a stone-lined pit sends dancing reflections against the forest-green curtain that divides the trunk into a cozy semicircle. Comfortable but businesslike, every spare corner of the room is jumbled with equipment suspended from hooks and pegs on the walls or stacked neatly on chests and cabinets crafted from sturdy oak and knotted pine.

node.name: Tremagis's Furs, Showroom
node.description: The acrid scent of curing vats and tallow reeks in the air here, a heavenly perfume to people like Tremagis, who runs the commercial furmongering in Shard from his workshop in the next room over. Trophies of his handiwork in the form of stretched, soft doeskin and stiff worked fur shells hang on the walls, all but covering them.

node.name: Tremagis's Furs, Furmongering
node.description: Stacks of cured hides and the stench of uncured ones fills this small back room. Tremagis, the furrier who runs this establishment, growls and grumbles as the local trappers and hunters arrive with their furs to exchange for coins.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Exterior
node.description: A two-story stone mansion rests here in a plot of well-trimmed hedges and perfectly shorn grass. Green vines draped with blood-red iera flowers climb the trellises and wind about granite gargoyles standing sentinel from their second-story perches, tickling the beasts' stony chins in a vain attempt to awaken them from their slumber.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Entrance Hall
node.description: Tall stained glass windows paint the checkered stone floor in colorful pools of light that spill down from above. A large bronze chandelier hangs down from the high half-timbered ceiling, its sconces filled with fresh candles. Tapestry chairs set beside a small fireplace in one corner if the hall offer respite, while two carved limestone arches leading east and west beckon visitors into the stately country home.

A large bronze chandelier hangs down from the high half-timbered ceiling, its flickering candles filling the room with a warm glow. Tapestry chairs set beside a crackling fireplace offer a place of respite, while two carved limestone arches leading east and west beckon visitors further into the reaches of this stately country home.

Tall stained glass windows paint the checkered stone floor in colorful pools of light that spill down from above. A large bronze chandelier hangs down from the high half-timbered ceiling, its sconces filled with fresh candles. Tapestry chairs set beside a small fireplace in one corner if the hall offer respite, while two carved limestone arches leading east and west beckon visitors into the stately country home.

node.name: Catherine's Court, West Wing
node.description: The stone walls of the hall soar to groined arches where pewter oil lamps hang down to illuminate the hallway. The sweet smell of jasmine drifts along the corridor from vases of blue flowers set on marble consoles. Above each of the consoles hangs a large gilt-framed portrait bearing the images of noble lords and ladies of the family. Plush indigo carpeting leads down the long hall, past the doors of private suites.

node.name: Catherine's Court, West Wing
node.description: Carved and inlaid wainscot chairs sit neatly spaced between doors leading off the hallway. On the outside corner of the corridor, a burnished suit of plate armor stands at attention before a cluster of stained glass windows partially overgrown with the ivy that creeps up the exterior walls.

node.name: Catherine's Court, West Wing
node.description: An intricately carved brass jardiniere spilling over with dried sprigs of jasmine and tin eku sits between two doorways on one side of the hall. Across from them hangs a beveled looking glass that mirrors the blue-black blossoms.

node.name: Catherine's Court, West Wing
node.description: Heraldic banners and pennants hang between the doors of each private suite and from the rafters of the ceiling above, a great waterfall of bold color against the dull limestone walls and dark oaken beams. The fabric ripples in drafts of air that blow in from the frame of a paneled oak door at the rounded far end of the hallway.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Gallery
node.description: Daylight streams in through two soaring bay windows swathed in a gold damask that falls to the floor in soft folds. Heraldic tapestries hang from the balustrade of the mezzanine above. Long refectory tables adorned with tasseled silk runners present refreshments in gilded platters and dainty crystal cups. The portrait of a noble elven man hangs above the large hooded fireplace, looking over those who pass below or stop to sit in the plush velvet chairs.

Silvery eyes of night peek through the two soaring bay windows swathed in gold damask. Heraldic tapestries hang from the balustrade of the mezzanine above, the woven crests barely visible in the flickering firelight. Long refectory tables adorned with tasseled silk runners present refreshments in gilded platters and dainty crystal cups. The portrait of a noble elven man hangs above the flickering fireplace, looking over those who pass below or stop to sit in the plush velvet chairs.

node.name: Catherine's Court, East Wing
node.description: The stone walls of the hall soar to groined arches where pewter oil lamps hang down to illuminate the hallway. A sweet floral scent drifts along the corridor from vases of crimson roses set on marble consoles. Above each of the consoles hangs a large gilt-framed portrait bearing the images of noble lords and ladies of the family. Plush red carpeting leads down the long hall, past the doors of private suites.

node.name: Catherine's Court, East Wing
node.description: Intricately carved mahogany chairs covered in rich red satin brocade sit neatly spaced between the sturdy doors leading off the hallway. On the outside corner of the corridor, white porcelain sculptures sit beneath a cluster of stained glass windows, their panes partially overgrown with the ivy that creeps up the exterior walls.

node.name: Catherine's Court, East Wing
node.description: A delicately painted ceramic jardiniere spilling over with fresh sprays of heather and sprig roses sits between two doorways on one side of the hall. On the opposite wall hangs a beveled looking glass that mirrors the blood-red blossoms.

node.name: Catherine's Court, East Wing
node.description: A large crystal chandelier hanging above the rounded terminus of the hallway spots the dull stone walls with a million tiny rainbows of refracted light. The crystal prisms tinkle musically with drafts of air that sneak through the frame of a carved oak door leading out to the cloister gardens. The colored glass tympanum glows with the image of Saint Ilysia.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Stair Landing
node.description: Wooden posts stand to either side of the landing, supporting the oak bannister that curls gracefully down the walls of the wide stairwell to the entrance hall. A stained glass door on the opposite wall spills color on the dull stone floor.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Lark's Hall
node.description: Golden silk covers the walls of this hallway, gilding the plaster and the oak beams of the half-timbered second story. Delicate bronze oil sconces sit evenly spread between the clusters of leaded glass windows on the eastern wall. Near the stair landing stands the wooden banister support, an ornately carved lark figurine perched on top.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Lark's Hall
node.description: A glass dome covers an arrangement of crystallized flowers set on an inlaid press cupboard, the light sparkling off each bud like dewdrops glistening in the first light of dawn. Pale blue violets and cream-colored roses lie woven into the long rugs that line the hallway, forming a bright field of flowers underfoot.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Lark's Hall
node.description: The aroma of violets and honeysuckle floats through the air like the soft breath of springtime, the scent coming from a wreath hung between two doors leading to private suites. A tarnished silver gauntlet mounted to a polished mahogany base sits on the sill beneath the windows clustered on the eastern wall, a grim contrast to the genteel elegance of the corridor. The hallway ends in a graceful oak archway that leads into a sitting room swathed in golden silk.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Morning Room
node.description: Tall windows follow the curve of the turret walls, allowing light from outside to pool onto the carpeted floor. Pastel colors highlight the ornately carved scallop arches over each window and the shelves set into the sunny yellow walls. A silver tray and chocolate pot gleam from atop an alabaster end table set between two elegant settees.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Owl's Hall
node.description: Immense tapestries woven in dusky shades covering the half-timbered walls of the hallway partially conceal the age-worn oak beams and yellowed plaster. The dim light in the corridor shifts erratically with the flickering of pewter oil sconces set between clusters of leaded glass windows on the western wall. Near the stair landing stands the wooden banister support, an intricately carved owl figurine perched on top.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Owl's Hall
node.description: The musty smell of old pelt rugs underlies the more pungent scent of oiled metal in this bend in the hallway. Polished swords and painted shields gleam with startling brilliance from the dull plaster walls between the muted blue tapestries, as if to remind passers-by that the glory of conquest somehow still lingers in the heart of the manor.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Owl's Hall
node.description: Above a graceful oak archway at the end of the hallway hangs a massive black greatsword, the dark steel blade looming overhead like the thunderheads of an approaching storm. The imposing weapon seems an odd contrast to the frail pale blue flowers of a potted sjarta bush that blooms beneath the windowsill, releasing a delicate aroma into the air.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Study
node.description: Polished oak paneling covers the walls of the windowless round room, nearly concealing bookshelves built into the curved wall behind a black leather sofa. A parchment map hangs above the sofa, the aged paper the color of yellowed bone. Plush velvet pillows with silver tasseled corners lie scattered on the soft snowbeast fur rug lining the stone floor of the large study.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Balcony
node.description: Starflower vines creeping up from the cloister garden below twine the lichen-patched stone balustrade. Daylight spreads across the carefully manicured landscape that stretches out behind the house and ends in a rich tangle of tall trees in the distance. Ornate brick chimneys clustered on the steeply pitched slate roofs of the east and west wings send tufts of silver smoke sailing into the pale sky.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Trail
node.note: House of the Gilded Longleaf|Gilded Longleaf
node.description: The trail meanders around a fallen tree and several large boulders. Wildflowers grow in sparse clumps hosting the occasional butterfly as they flit from one batch to the next. Waving in the breeze, ribbons clearly mark the route.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Obscure Trail
node.description: Trees and heavy brush crowd a game trail obscured by fallen leaves and growing ferns. Little more than a rut in the forest floor, it gently curves to avoid a deadfall. The forest is filled with the sound of twittering birds and the scent of pine needles.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Encampment
node.description: Wagons of various sizes and shapes are spread throughout the area, with some connected by covered walkways for larger families. Bright pink bee balm flowers grow with abundance here, attracting hummingbirds -- a favorite bird of the elders who come to watch them during the day. Steps lead towards the main building.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Wooded Trail
node.description: Familial wagons create small huddled circles here, the flickering light from the communal hearth warming the space. Windowsill planters and large earthen pots filled with flowers and medicinal herbs add color and beauty to the surroundings.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Wooded Trail
node.description: Growing more abundantly as the trail heads northward, the trees are thick on the ground. Very few wagons are found here, giving a sense of solitude to the area. Several pots of bright red geraniums are placed side by side with herbs, adding both beauty and function to the portable landscaping. The path continues toward the sound of water while a ramp heads to a forest bower.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Wooded Trail
node.description: Quiet prevails around the area save for the occasional sound of a bird singing or the rustle of the tall trees in the wind. Long troughs of fragrant, shade-loving herbs grow abundantly in the darkness of the forest.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Wooded Trail
node.description: Spread thinly here, the distant wagons add to the sense of solitude in the area. Lavender scents the air, growing in large pots alongside other herbs. A nearby wagon is painted a bright blue and stenciled with a colorful butterfly. The path continues towards the sound of water.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, House Garden
node.description: Straight and angular, the walkways evenly divide each type of plant from other varieties. Herbs, vegetables and dwarf fruit trees abound providing more than enough food for every member of the House and any guests that may visit. Gardeners work fastidiously at tending their charges. A wooded path leads directly to a large building, allowing the cooks and their assistants easy access.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Back Porch
node.description: Open on three sides, this simple, covered porch offers both a back entrance to the kitchen and a welcomed respite from the heat of the stove. The boughs of wild cherry and plum trees cascade over the slatted handrails beside which two rustic benches rest. A rough-hewn walkway leads past the meeting forum to another building in the distance while a meandering woodland path offers access to the vegetable and herb gardens.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Kitchen
node.description: Cooks work busily at the three tables standing in the center of the room. With its simmering pots and whistling kettles, a round stove nestles in the corner opposite a massive whitewashed pantry. Along the far wall, a large window and the brass lanterns flanking it offer ample light for cooking and cleaning alike. In an attempt to vent the heat of the room, a simple curtain is pulled aside to reveal the back porch.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Dining Hall
node.description: Saffron-yellow tablecloths, cerulean cushions and delicate floral arrangements disguise the simple, low tables and benches at which meals are served in this busy common room. Braziers have been placed along the rear wall to offer diners light and warmth as they enjoy the gentle, woodland breezes that waft in through an oversized window. An aggressive wisteria vine winds its way through the silk-draped lattice walls, scenting the area with its heady aroma.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Foyer
node.description: Jaunty watercolor paintings and panels of billowing silk adorn the simple, latticed walls that enclose this winsome chamber. Tiles of tightly-woven sisal, dyed various shades of sepia and brown, have been arranged to form a mosaic carpet that covers the slatted floor of the platform. The room's focal point is a large, lacquered secretary that stands opposite the opening leading into a graceful pergola.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Veranda
node.description: Honeysuckle and jasmine have twined up the graceful columns that support the shallow, convex roof enclosing this welcoming portico. Mimicking the colors of the flowering vines, a vermilion and cream floor runner stretches across the timber platform from the edge of a teak ramp to the cheerful double doors leading into the building. Beside the doors stands a weathered statue of an Elothean woman gesturing at a bronze gong.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Library
node.description: A trio of gaethzen moons hung in the center of the small room provide soft light for reading. Pull-down coverings conceal some of the shelves that line all available wall space, and comfortable chairs are scattered about the area for late-night study. A small desk with a sign on it sits near the exit.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Front Lawn
node.description: Ornamental grasses grow before an eclectic structure crafted of interconnected sections capped by gently sloping roofs. Open and airy, the building has many large, window-like openings shaded by billowing, colorful awnings. Across from the structure is a towering longleaf pine, a flower-filled thicket wending its way south from the tree. In the center of the clearing stands an ancient sundial.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Path
node.description: Amid a riot of daisies and buttercups sits a red-lacquered wooden bench. Swarms of colorful butterflies fly over the flowers in ever-changing clouds. An arbor, laced with blue and white flowers, interrupts the otherwise impenetrable wall of the nearby thicket.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Meadow
node.description: Following the thicket, the path travels through a small, overgrown meadow. Lilac bushes fill the open area giving off their sweet, heady fragrance. The ever-present butterflies have given way to honey bees from a nearby hive who are working tirelessly at collecting pollen. Ribbons have been regularly placed on the bushes and thicket to mark the path.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Wooded Path
node.description: The maintained path follows the thicket through woods populated with pine, cedar and oak trees. Wildflowers dominate the ground cover surrounding sweet-smelling lilac bushes. The butterflies fly more thickly here, and the air is full of their fluttering wings. Discreet ribbons are tied to the bushes and thicket in regular intervals to mark the way through the undergrowth.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Glade
node.description: Snapdragons and verbena grow in a profusion of color here, covering every inch of the ground. Lush spicebushes nestle against the thicket which looms nearby, its brilliant orange flowers sending a siren call to the butterflies which flock to the area for miles around. A game trail leads to the southeast and a wooded path heads north, following the thicket.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Forest Bower
node.description: Encircling giant ferns offer privacy to this peaceful glade while the boughs of towering trees and a simple awning offer shelter from the elements. The gentle murmur of a nearby stream promises a restful slumber in the open air. For that purpose, a collection of hammocks clusters around a stone firepit. Some thoughtful soul has left jugs of spring water and a basket of freshly-baked bread near the forest-green door leading into the building.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Hall
node.description: Spacious windows allow gentle woodland breezes to carry the scents of exotic flowers and decaying leaves throughout this workroom. The center of the hall is dominated by rows of tables that provide workspace for all manner of industry. Silk looms and graceful easels are turned to take the greatest advantage of the light. To the rear of the room, willow stand lamps flank a rounded alcove leading to the dormitory wing.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Remembrance Hall
node.description: To either side of a teak walkway, elaborate trelliswork rises from the woodland floor, creating a vast pergola under the tree canopy. Small shrines are sheltered among the hostas, painted ferns, and bluebells that quilt the ground while a profusion of vines reaches upward along the carved beams of the enclosure. The sound of birdcalls and the steady rhythm of a water clock are all that mar the reverent silence of the hall. Gaps in the pergola reveal an arbored footpath.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Forum
node.description: Little more than a large, round clearing under the canopy of several towering trees, the forum boasts two concentric rings of benches centering on the speaker's mound. Rows of torches and embroidered pennants surround the seating area.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, Golden Repose
node.description: Tiger maple paneling and a glazed glass window make this room one of the rare fully enclosed spaces in the complex. Though the cozy chamber is modest in size, no expense has been spared to make guests feel comfortable. A lacquered dresser, bearing an alabaster wash basin, sits opposite an overstuffed featherbed. Beneath the small window rests a mahogany rocking chair.

node.name: House of the Gilded Longleaf, White Chamber
node.description: The whitewashed, lattice walls of this charming room are interwoven with silver silk and accented with several lace wall hangings depicting healing herbs. A modest featherbed is covered with matching silk linens, and a grass-green folding chair sits beside a window. An arrangement of chysanthemums and wild ginger blossoms graces a small table next to the chair.

node.name: Darkmist Moor
node.description: A strange, meticulously placed line of bones begins here, travelling to the northeast through the tall grass. Comprised of many sizes and shapes, the bones are devoid of rotted flesh or sinew.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Trail of Bones
node.description: A strange trail of bones is scattered amidst the tall grasses, wending its through the boggy marsh. The moor's vegetation grows a bit thicker to the east as one travels further from the road.

node.name: Darkmist Moor
node.description: The rocky ground is covered with blue-grey lichen and sturdy pale yellow weeds. Fingers of mist whirl around a broken arrow wedged between two thin ribs of a long decayed torso. The lower half of the skeleton lies several feet away, likely dragged by scavengers, with a single moldering boot clinging to what little is left of its owner.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Trail of Bones
node.description: Just south of the bone path, the land drops suddenly for several feet. The earth of the slope has been disturbed in small patches, and several clumps of heather lay scattered and uprooted.

node.name: Darkmist Moor
node.description: The dark green grass here is slowly losing its battle with mortality. Patches of light brown dead grass stand out against the darker green of their surroundings. To the southeast you can see the silhouette of a dead tree, its now bare branches reaching up as if in supplication. Several cracked rocks litter the ground, their shattered, blackened surfaces indicating that some power other than weather and time are to blame for their state.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Trail of Bones
node.description: An ancient stump sits nearly buried in the tall grass of the moor. Pale grey fans of some unidentifiable fungus spread from its side while specks of a scarlet mold stretch up the trunk from the roots. In contrast to these tenacious vestiges of life, the bleached trail of bones runs past the stump and stretches to the west and northeast.

node.name: Darkmist Moor
node.description: A solitary dead tree, bleached white by the sun, still reaches its limbs high above the brown, lifeless patch of earth surrounding it. Dozens of kobold skulls hang from the branches, suspended from ropes woven from the blades of the grass that is so abundant in the moor. A hollow knocking sound is emitted by the skulls as they swing against each other in the wind.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Trail of Bones
node.description: The grass here is trampled around a great pile of decaying remains. Femurs, skulls and skeletal hands lie in a heap with broken weapons and bits of rotting leather armor. The trail of bones continues to the southwest and southeast, but whatever caused this carnage appears to have paused here for some time before moving on.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Trail of Bones
node.description: The trail dips gently into a fog-filled depression. A small underground spring trickles from the rocks, making the ground along the trail spongy and wet. The damp mist clings to everything, muffling sound and limiting sight to a few yards in any direction.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Trail of Bones
node.description: A flat grey rock stretches across the path, briefly interrupting the gruesome ivory trail. The tall dark green grass moves slightly in a gentle breeze, providing the only sign of life in this otherwise still expanse. Off to one side, a decaying kobold head sits atop a crudely carved post -- a sacrifice, perhaps, or a warning.

node.name: Darkmist Moor
node.description: Pale yellow weeds compete with the grass of the moor for the dim sunlight that filters through the mist. A small patch of briars curls its thorny fingers over a large rock jutting from the ground. To the east, the mist thickens into a dense fog, while to the south, the moor can be seen stretching away with only the occasional tree to mark the distance.

Pale yellow weeds intermingle with the damp grasses of the moor. A small patch of briars curls its thorny fingers over a large rock jutting from the ground. To the east, the mist thickens into a dense fog, while to the south, the moor can be seen stretching away with only the occasional tree to mark the distance.

node.name: Darkmist Moor
node.description: A half-buried boulder interrupts the game trail, its jagged surface covered in more of the blue-grey lichen that seems to flourish on the rocks of the grassland. A rusted spearhead wedged deeply into the stone attests to the violence that once swept over this area.

node.name: Darkmist Moor
node.description: Crushed grass and a broken sword half buried in the ground give evidence of a violent struggle some time ago, though what became of the combatants remains a mystery. A game trail loops from the northeast and northwest, but little else of note is apparent in the sea of grass rolling out in all directions. Even the gentle rustling of the grass is muted by the dampness of the air.

node.name: Darkmist Moor
node.description: A gnarled tree huddles in the grass. Its branches have been peppered with small arrows, and claw marks scar the trunk. Within the branches, the dull glint of a helm can be spotted through the leaves. Whatever creature it was that sought safety in the tree's arms apparently did not find it here.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Trail of Bones
node.description: A small hip bone juts from beneath one of several low bushes that grow clumped together several feet from the trail of bones. Amidst the long sharp thorns and tiny bright red berries rests a long solitary branch, its bark darker and more coarse than the bushes' slender stems.

node.name: Darkmist Moor
node.description: An uprooted tree lies on its side, surrounded by broken branches and pieces of bark. A patch of blackened earth on the leeward side of the tree tells of at least one campfire built from its remains. Trampled grass makes paths to the southwest and southeast leading from the tree.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Secluded Shrine
node.description: Shrouded in dark purple mist, a tall ebony altar rises from the overgrown grass. A collection of hideous gargoyles stands sentry in a macabre circle around the shrine, sneering inward at the scarred monolith.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Tamsine's Sorrow
node.description: The mists grow denser eastward, roiling together into a thick pall that obscures any pathway in the heavy darkness. Spindly bushes barren of leaves randomly claw their way upwards.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Dirt Road
node.description: The ground slopes along the sides of a simple dirt road meandering northward from the thin mists. Delightfully earthy smells of dust and wildlife punctuate the crisp fresh air. A small white building sits quietly at the side of an abandoned road.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Scraggly Treetop
node.description: The age-worn tree lofts its branches just above the heavy pall of mist, offering a clear vantage of the surrounding terrain. A simple whitewashed church contrasts starkly against the darkness of the countryside to the east, an odd sight amidst so much gloom.

The age-worn tree lofts its branches just above the heavy pall of mist, offering a clear vantage of the surrounding terrain. A simple whitewashed church nestles in the green countryside to the east, an odd sight amidst so much gloom.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Country Church
node.description: A small rustic church, with an overhanging roof and rough-hewn wooden pillars, watches solemnly over the area. Ivory-white paint is flaking and peeling from its walls, which are embraced by creeping vines of deep green ivy.

node.name: Country Church, Church Foyer
node.description: Though this narrow vestibule is small, it is crowned by a lovely high ceiling from which dangles the remains of a shattered chandelier. Its walls are lined with old, faded portraits smudged with dirt.

node.name: Country Church, Main Hall
node.description: One large room comprises the church's sanctuary. Simple pine pews line both sides of a tiny center aisle that leads to an altar to the north. Small stained glass windows depicting woodland scenes adorn the walls on either side of the pews.

node.name: Country Church, Altar
node.description: All that adorns this understated altar is a faded white linen cloth. The wooden planks underfoot are well worn from years of use, and they creak softly with each shift of weight.

node.name: Country Church, Short Hallway
node.description: Barely five feet long, this short hallway is separated from the sanctuary by a gracefully carved railing, leading to a narrow alcove at its eastern end.

node.name: Country Church, Cleric's Office
node.description: Barely furnished, this quiet office was designed for resident clerics to prepare for ceremonies. A small table with a matching chair is pushed against one wall.

node.name: Country Church, Cloakroom
node.description: Ornate brass hooks adorn the walls where clerical vestments once hung. The air is hot and choked with dust thanks to the lack of any appreciable ventilation.

node.name: Country Church, Statue Alcove
node.description: A tall wooden statue of Hodierna stands resolutely upon a painted column, staring blankly ahead. There is an inherent darkness in this corner of the church, which cloaks the details of the architecture and bathes the mirthless statue in perpetual gloom.

node.name: Country Church, Back Porch
node.description: Cracked and splintered boards, making a poor excuse for a porch, lead to a faded white door at the back of this forlorn little church. A dirt path runs parallel to the damaged planks, leading northwest toward a cemetery.

node.name: Country Church, Cemetery Approach
node.description: A rickety porch nestled in the overgrown grasses of the moor provides entry to the back door of the dilapidated old church. A scraggly dirt path heavily draped with weeds meanders northeast, approaching a long-forgotten cemetery.

node.name: Country Church, Cemetery Gate
node.description: Shattered remnants of an ancient iron gate flank the faint dirt pathway to either side, no longer hindering passage into the cemetery. Thick weeds and vines slither into the once intricate latticework, vying for a higher perch on which to bask.

node.name: Country Church, Cemetery
node.description: Visible a short distance to the south, a modest mausoleum of grey granite rises out of the grassy moor. The weed-ridden dirt pathway snakes eastward, making a wide arc through the cemetery and around to the structure.

node.name: Country Church, Cemetery
node.description: A faint dirt path wends southeast through a morbid garden of weatherworn tombstones. Scraggly grasses push up through the ground above the ancient plots, creeping their way across the path.

node.name: Country Church, Cemetery
node.description: The dirt path bends sharply at the foot of a haggard hangman's tree, which bows beneath the weight of the souls it has reaped. Several large stones scattered amidst the weeds and grass form erratic patterns.

node.name: Country Church, Cemetery
node.description: Monstrous gargoyles herald your approach to the granite mausoleum to the northwest, sneering wickedly at those that cross the dusty dirt path. An ornate gold-veined marble tombstone lurches out of the ground just south of the path, marking the resting place of some noble of long ago.

node.name: Country Church, Before Mausoleum
node.description: The faint path turns into a round patch of grassless dirt before a pair of great obsidian doors that safeguard entrance to the grey granite mausoleum. Unlike the rest of the pathway, the dirt here is free of the omnipresent weeds and grass, as if recent movement had discouraged their growth. Gargoyles perched within high niches flanking the doors leer ominously down at all below.

node.name: Dragon's Spine, Behind the Waterfall
node.description: Footing becomes quite treacherous here as each new step brings forth more uncertainty. Tiny rivulets of icy water trickle down from the waterfall and freeze, adding to the already slippery sheet of ice on the ground. The more adventurous traveler might either chance the dark woodlands ahead or ferret out some way to penetrate and attempt to swim the frozen river. The less daring of souls will quickly retreat from whence they came.

node.name: Shrine to the Dragon, A Dank Passage
node.description: Streams of light trickle over some uneven jade stairs to the north. A passage westward leads towards the rest of the shrine.

node.name: Shrine to the Dragon, A Dank Passage
node.description: The murals that were once here have long since faded from the walls, leaving behind broken plaster and crumbling stone as their remain. The only apparent exit lies east.

node.name: Shrine to the Dragon, Central Chamber
node.description: This chamber is carved directly into the stone of the caverns. The walls are a dark green jade, encircling a stained altar that rests in the very center. Statues, shattered and smashed by time and angry mortal hands alike, stand forever frozen in broken dances. Elegant brass sconces still flicker with mystic lights, dim but bright enough to illuminate the area.

node.name: Jade Cavern, Vestibule
node.description: Elaborate stone carvings arch overhead, twisting into fascinating shapes. Tall columns crafted from translucent jade flank the walls that lead further west into the heart of the caverns.

node.name: Jade Cavern, Dark Passage
node.description: The walls are gouged and scratched, chunks of rock ripped from the once-polished and painted murals. Fragments of tile lie shattered on the floor, crunching at the lightest touch.

node.name: Jade Cavern, Small Opening
node.description: Luminescent walls of rough green jade curve around you, the cupped, smooth hands of the earth. A path chisled into the stone floor leads east.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Altar of the Flesh
node.description: The smooth onyx floor has been shattered by thick, muscular roots pushing upward. The roots intertwine into a contorted mass in the center of the hall. The stench of burning flesh rises from the strange altar, yet no fire is visible.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Hall of the Flesh
node.description: Muted light from the southwest casts dark wavering images on the unblemished onyx wall and bounces to the neighboring wall. Further shadows shimmer eerily on the polished floor, resembling writhing bodies caught in the throes of a painful death.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Onyx Corridor
node.description: A wavering torch secured in a solid stone funnel is solidly fused into the glossy onyx wall near the high ceiling. Occasional wafts of air cause the flame to twist slowly, an imitation of an ominous dance of the macabre.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Onyx Corridor
node.description: The smooth, glossy finish of the onyx walls is unbroken. The passage seems brighter to the southwest, where filtered light seeps into the room, reflecting eerie shadows on the polished surface.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Onyx Corridor
node.description: Surrounded on all sides by smooth lustrous onyx walls, the enclosed environment lends the impression of being entombed in a box of solid rock. Occasionally a glimmer of light will reflect dully across the unblemished surfaces, causing a brief moment of vertigo.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Hall of the Soul
node.description: Sinister frescoes adorn the northern wall of this cavernous hall, where the dichotomy of the silver and onyx hallways merges into one. The ceiling is a sweeping arch of black crystal, supported by pillars of darkly veined jade. A twisting hallway with verdant malachite walls winds to the south.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Hall of the Soul
node.description: Irregular formations of malachite create a treacherous cavern that winds in an erratic serpentine pattern to the south. The air is crisp, cold, and fresh, with no hint of the musty pall draped over the rest of the ancient temple.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Hall of the Soul
node.description: The icy air carries the faint tinkling of off-key wind chimes that echoes eerily through the dark malachite tunnel. As one travels southerly down the hall, the temperature seems to drop rapidly.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Hall of the Soul
node.description: A thin layer of frost coats the malachite formations, while slender icicles jab downward into the hall. Vapor crystallizes with every breath, each a wraith of former life captured forever by the cruel clutches of the temple's heart.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Altar of the Soul
node.description: The ice-laden floor suddenly gives way to an enormous chasm to the south. Tendrils of intricate silver writhe out from the dusky malachite walls, intertwining to form a strange altar just before the lip of the gaping chasm. Far in the distance to the south, a glimmering crystalline dais hovers inexplicably over the great pit.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Silver Corridor
node.description: Smooth and deathly cold to the touch, the silver walls are free of any markings. A pale luminance from the northwest seems to beckon the unwary traveler.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Silver Corridor
node.description: Silver walls, their smooth surface polished to a glossy finish, refract the dim light invading menacingly from the southeast. Odd reflections bounce between the polished surfaces, causing a moment of dizziness that quickly passes.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Silver Corridor
node.description: An old lantern, its finish blackened from years of use, hangs from a silver hook embedded in the passageway's ceiling. Nefarious shadows, resembling malformed beings, flitter gruesomely on the silver walls as subtle air currents cause the lantern to sway ominously.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Hall of the Mind
node.description: Dim light filtering eerily from the southeast allows enough luminance to see that the passage continues. The silvery walls are slick and cold to the touch.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Altar of the Mind
node.description: The silver walls take on a brilliant emerald hue, painted by the light emanating from a makeshift altar formed from a massive block of green crystal set upon two egg-shaped stones. The faint murmuring of foreign prayers echoes on the edge of aural perception, yet nags incessantly at your mind. The alcove is barren of embellishments, accentuating the austerity of its reflective walls.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Hall of the Mind
node.description: Faint light from the northeast casts grim shadows on the glossy silver walls, illuminating the dark passage slightly. The polished mirror-like surface of each wall reflects distorted impressions of the moving images it captures.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Silver Corridor
node.description: Silver walls, shrouded with lines of faint luminance from the southwest, stretch upwards to a smooth metallic ceiling. This refracted light seems to move of its own volition, converging into long, silvery tendrils that creep deeply into the darker recesses of the wide corridor.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Silver Corridor
node.description: A sputtering torch is nested securely in a conical silver bracket attached to a corner near the ceiling. The reflected image of the torch is mirrored upon two of the glossy silver walls and ceiling, its wavering likeness shimmering unendingly against the polished surface.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Silver Corridor
node.description: Smooth silver walls, with an identical ceiling and floor, form a glossy passageway to greet the unwary traveler. Random echoes of light glaze the shiny surfaces like skeletal hands scraping long bony fingers across a polished mirror.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Entry Hall
node.description: This great hall features vaulted walls of dark crystal and an inlaid floor of green-veined marble. A faint, spiritual chanting converges from every which direction, buoyed by frigid air.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Onyx Corridor
node.description: High onyx walls line a featureless passageway along whose mirror-like surfaces a shock of light occasionally crackles to show travelers the way.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Onyx Corridor
node.description: A rusted iron lamp swings precariously from the vaulted onyx ceiling, disturbed by a strong breeze. The erratic flicker cast from above draws ever-shifting apparitions of shadow on the smooth onyx walls, leaving one to wonder what is real and what is illusion.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Onyx Corridor
node.description: The smooth onyx of the walls is disrupted here, with each wall carved in its own intricate, raised pattern. The shallow illumination flowing from the southeast casts soft shadows from the raised features.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Hall of the Flesh
node.description: Diffused light from the northwest casts a dull glow against the smooth surface of the onyx walls. The walls feel cold to the touch and no seams mar their perfect symmetry.

node.name: Abyssal Descent, Entry Hall
node.description: The exquisite white marble floors are veined with swirls of verdant green forming the shape of a triple-tined claw pointing northward to the worship halls. A great black crystal archway leads south, back to the clergy's quarters.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: Vaulting high to the ceiling, a black crystalline archway opens a narrow corridor to the north. A discordant choral chant echoes against the dark stone enclosure, carrying from far away.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: A stale, coppery stench fills the dark stone corridor. Rust-colored stains, looking suspiciously like blood, mar the pale ash door in the southern wall.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: Shadows drape the northeastern corner like lingering specters, unwavering in the feeble glare of makeshift torches affixed to rusty iron sconces in the walls.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: A flickering torch in the eastern wall casts a feeble glow down the dark stone corridor, barely forcing the shadows to abate.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: Shards of clear crystal cover the dark stone ground, possibly relics fashioned by the absent inhabitants of the temple many years before. Movement through the hallway has caused some of these shards to clump oddly against a black granite pedestal, as if protecting it.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: The overwhelming stench of decay fills the dank corridor, emanating from a rotting alder door in the north wall. Thin patches of unidentifiable mold mark random trails on the cold damp walls, almost like sinister handprints left by an unearthly child.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: The stone corridor curves haphazardly, with jagged shards of dark grey stone jutting out of the southeastern corner. An empty doorway with shattered remnants of wood hanging off it gapes open in the northwestern wall.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: Ripped grey cotton tapestries drape the dark stone of the southern wall, once offering reverence to some now-unrecognizable deity.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: Dark grey stone walls and cold basalt floors stretch far beyond sight through the dimly lit corridors that branch from this central nexus. Two dilapidated pine doors flank the southern passage.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: Barely attached to its rusted iron hinges, a battered pine door hangs crookedly from the northern wall. Scraps of rotting cloth lie strewn about the floor, perhaps serving as nightly shelter for the errant rat or two, as evidenced by trails of dried droppings.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: The curving corridor seems crude and haphazard, shards of jagged stone sticking out from the walls. This temple was obviously constructed in haste, with an eye toward functionality rather than beauty.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: A scarred alder door in the eastern wall bears several heavy gashes, perhaps the result of some past conflict. Empty cobwebs hang forlornly from the narrow corners of the stone ceiling.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: The chill air is dank and sour, carrying the stenches of decay, dried blood, and stale dust. The corridor branches to the east, wending further into the forgotten temple.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: Shattered chips of mahogany lie scattered over the cold stone floor before an empty doorway in the eastern wall. A remnant of ripped cloth hangs from the door's smashed iron hinge.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: A rusted iron rack hangs in the northwestern corner, bearing several implements of war. An omnipresent, distant chanting rises and falls in your ears, carrying eerily through the corridor.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dark Hallway
node.description: Across from a cracked ash door, an empty rusted iron sconce juts out of the northern wall. The shadows here drape heavily, choking what feeble light flickers from down the hallway.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Sunken Vestibule
node.description: Leaning walls inlaid with panes of polished black onyx enclose this sunken, icy vestibule that is lit by sparkles of dark gold winking fleetingly like teasing ghosts. Odd sounds echo back and forth, reminiscent of a choir bustling through rehearsal.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Prison Hallway
node.description: The uneven dark stone walls bear strange, ancient etchings that depict gruesome scenes of war. Dark colors outlining some of the carvings have permanently leached into the porous stone.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Prison Hallway
node.description: The four hallways converge here, centered around a massive grid of wrought iron that stretches out over a shadow-draped pit sunk deep into the ground. A thick noxious order of decay curls up from the depths of this repugnant cage.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Prison Hallway
node.description: The dark stone floor is uncluttered and swept clean of dust and debris, leaving the impression that something has been here recently. In spite of the lack of rubble, the air smells dank, with a hint of decay.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Prison Hallway
node.description: An empty sconce hangs askew from one wall, the area around it scorched black. Clumps of cobwebs, heavy with dust, enshroud the tarnished brass.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Prison Hallway
node.description: Deep gouge marks mar the rough stone floor, as if something with very large claws was dragged in an unwilling manner through the passage. Moisture has collected in some of the indentations, causing the floor to be slick in spots.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Monks' Quarters
node.description: Ten cedar-framed cots, with tattered blankets scattered haphazardly on each, line the walls of this moderate-sized room. The harsh stone walls bear no adornment.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Baths
node.description: The small chamber is dimly lit by flickering torches in the rough stone walls. The feeble light reflects soft wavering images off the glassy black waters of a large bathing pool.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Obsidian Pool
node.description: Dimly flickering torchlight glimmers off the rippling, glassy black waters of the pool. The water is icy, chilling you to the bone.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Theurgists' Chamber
node.description: Mangled black cotton tapestries drape the walls, twitching slightly with the subtle currents of air caused by your presence. Three mahogany beds are pushed tightly up against the walls.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Magical Workshop
node.description: The heavy odors of ash and sulfur permeate this claustrophobic stone enclosure. Bookcases laden with scrolls and volumes line the walls, everything badly charred from some recent blaze. Several tables and counters are strewn with all sorts of odd equipment.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Hierophant's Chamber
node.description: An intricate mosaic of gleaming gemstone tiles graces the otherwise gloomy stone wall above an ancient silverwillow bed. Stained linens, shredded and tattered in some past struggle, hang off the bed and onto the cold stone floor.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Library
node.description: Fallen bookshelves lie strewn about the dark stone ground, burnt and razed of all they may have held. It appears that someone -- or something -- did not want what was in this room to be found. A single page ripped from an unknown tome seems to have been spared, left lying on a cracked cedar desk.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Theurgists' Chamber
node.description: Oddly centered in the middle of the room is a rickety oak bookcase. Dark cotton tapestries, their colored patterns faded, hang above three identical mahogany beds pushed up flush against the walls.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Storage Closet
node.description: Empty boxes and crates are stacked in an orderly fashion, rising up to the dark stone ceiling. A single cask lies splintered on the ground, its contents long since emptied.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Priests' Quarters
node.description: Six large willow-framed cots are arranged neatly around the small chamber. The walls and floors are barren, except for a single cedar cabinet in one corner.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Priests' Quarters
node.description: Six large willow-framed cots are arranged neatly around the small chamber. The walls and floors are barren, except for a single cedar cabinet in one corner.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dank Cell
node.description: A shattered skeleton lies in one corner, half of its skull split off and lying nearby. It is safe to surmise that life has not graced this dank cell for some time, for unbroken cobwebs hang everywhere, their occupants busily spinning undisturbed homes.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dank Cell
node.description: Iron shackles hang from the cold stone walls, flecked with strange substances and rust. A foul coppery stench hangs in the air, punctuated with sharp wafts of decay.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dank Cell
node.description: This large cell, built to hold thirty prisoners or more, now lies abandoned. Only the chalkmarks on the walls and the gouges in the floor leading up to the cell door give evidence of victims' passing.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Dank Cell
node.description: This desolate cell of rough granite bears the marks of heavy use -- the floor is spattered with dried blood. Heavy hash marks, perhaps depicting days of captivity, mar one wall.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Acolytes' Quarters
node.description: Smashed cots lie in disarray on the ground, a splintered and torn mess of wood and canvas. Thick brown stains are prevalent throughout the wreckage, making it easy to imagine the slaughter that once occurred here.

The room is rather large, but packed tightly with twenty cedar-framed cots with the sparest coarse linens. The pattern is orderly and symmetrical -- artificial. The stale scent of dust clings to the back of your throat.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Hierophant's Chamber
node.description: An ancient silverwillow bed swathed in shredded silk linens sets against the southern wall. A rich mahogany armoire inlaid with silver filigree stands nearby, flanked by an ornate blued-steel cloak rack.

node.name: Darkmist Moor, Nightshade Tangle
node.description: Barren of leaves, wretched trees loom up from the tall grass looking a great deal like upturned claws. A somber mist perpetually hangs in the air, dampening your lungs with its weight.
Irregular patches of tall grass and squat shrubs lie beneath a sinuous blanket of dark purple mist. The twisted shadow of an occasional barren tree looms in the foggy distance.
Sinuous tendrils of dark purple mist swim through the air, entangling themselves in the deformed limbs of barren trees like ethereal serpents. The dusky scent of nightshade carries over the moor.
Sharp shadows cut through the landscape, accenting the twisted silhouettes of the grotesquely haggard trees while concealing the hazards that lie hidden within the patches of tall grass.
Swaths of dark mist drape the moor in layers of shadow, concealing the source of a malignant rustling that waits in nearby tangles of nightshade.

Tall grasses sway under the ebb and flow of the dark purple mists, kissing the verdant blades with icy dew. Patches of colorful nightshade bloom amidst the grasses, a beautiful yet deadly addition to this dark, wild garden.
Tendrils of blooming nightshade climb high through the dark mists into the vacant claw-like trees, appearing to give the deceased husks some semblance of life, however perverted.
The dark mists cast a bluish-lavender pall through the air. The motion of every shadow is magnified, twitching in wait just beyond your field of vision.

The dusky scent of nightshade seems to manifest visually as the rolling, dark mists that are omnipresent over the wild moor. The grasses waver in a lilting motion, enchanted by the intoxicating aroma.
The soft mist makes everything seem muted and far away, disconnected and tinged with the illusion of a dream world.

node.description: Barren of leaves, wretched trees loom up from the tall grass looking a great deal like upturned claws. A somber mist perpetually hangs in the air, dampening your lungs with its weight.
Irregular patches of tall grass and squat shrubs lie beneath a sinuous blanket of dark purple mist. The twisted shadow of an occasional barren tree looms in the foggy distance.
Sinuous tendrils of dark purple mist swim through the air, entangling themselves in the deformed limbs of barren trees like ethereal serpents. The dusky scent of nightshade carries over the moor.
Sharp shadows cut through the landscape, accenting the twisted silhouettes of the grotesquely haggard trees while concealing the hazards that lie hidden within the patches of tall grass.
Swaths of dark mist drape the moor in layers of shadow, concealing the source of a malignant rustling that waits in nearby tangles of nightshade.

Tall grasses sway under the ebb and flow of the dark purple mists, kissing the verdant blades with icy dew. Patches of colorful nightshade bloom amidst the grasses, a beautiful yet deadly addition to this dark, wild garden.
Tendrils of blooming nightshade climb high through the dark mists into the vacant claw-like trees, appearing to give the deceased husks some semblance of life, however perverted.
The dark mists cast a bluish-lavender pall through the air. The motion of every shadow is magnified, twitching in wait just beyond your field of vision.

The dusky scent of nightshade seems to manifest visually as the rolling, dark mists that are omnipresent over the wild moor. The grasses waver in a lilting motion, enchanted by the intoxicating aroma.
The soft mist makes everything seem muted and far away, disconnected and tinged with the illusion of a dream world.

node.name: Mausoleum, Receiving Chamber
node.description: A gleaming marble tiled hallway stretches into the bowels of the mausoleum, flanked by great pillars of granite that support the structure. Cobwebs drape delicately over tables of empty brass urns. A pair of great obsidian doors in the southern edge of the hall form the exit from the mausoleum.

node.name: Mausoleum, Hallway
node.description: The great open space of the hall seems muted and claustrophobic, clenched in the presence of something intangible. Tapestries cascade down from the vaulted ceiling along either side of the hallway, wavering like dancing ghosts in the stale, musty air. Through the dim light, a collection of marble biers is visible, lining the northern end of the hallway.

node.name: Mausoleum, Biers
node.description: Ten great marble biers are arranged in a fanned semi-circle at the northern end of the hallway. Streaming down from a small hole in the ceiling, a shaft of bright golden sunlight falls within their midst. A steel-reinforced ebony coffin rests on one of the marble biers. Several chains hang loosely down along the sides of the bier. Cascading down the eastern wall, a blood red tapestry adds a splash of rich color to the otherwise austere environment.

Ten great marble biers are arranged in a fanned semi-circle at the northern end of the hallway. Streaming down from a small hole in the ceiling, a shaft of bright golden sunlight falls within their midst. A steel-reinforced ebony coffin hangs in the air, suspended by several heavy chains above the biers. Cascading down the eastern wall, a blood red tapestry adds a splash of rich color to the otherwise austere environment.

Ten great marble biers are arranged in a fanned semi-circle at the northern end of the hallway. Streaming down from a small hole in the ceiling, a shaft of pale silver starlight falls within their midst. A steel-reinforced ebony coffin rests on one of the marble biers. Several chains hang loosely down along the sides of the bier. Cascading down the eastern wall, a blood red tapestry adds a splash of rich color to the otherwise austere environment.
