Streaming down from a small hole in the ceiling, a shaft of pale silver starlight falls within their midst. A steel-reinforced ebony coffin hangs in the air, suspended by several heavy chains above the biers. Cascading down the eastern wall, a blood red tapestry adds a splash of rich color to the otherwise austere environment.

node.name: Mausoleum, Alcove
node.description: An aura of warm light illuminates the alcove, emanating from dozens of candles held within tall silver sconces mounted on the marble floor. A large wooden wheel has been affixed to the north wall, while rugged steel chains run up into some sort of pulley mechanism on the rafters. A heavy woven rope dangles down from above, fastened to the same contraption.

node.name: Mausoleum, Alcove
node.description: Inky black shadows saturate the alcove like a heavy fog, making it hard to discern anything but faint outlines and shapes. A strange wheel nestles up against the north wall, entangled in a thick netting of cobwebs. A snake-like rope dangles down from the darkness above.

node.name: Mausoleum, Inside Coffin
node.description: Pure white satin padding makes lying in this claustrophobic box a bit more inviting than you would otherwise imagine. A shaft of bright golden sunlight streams through a small hole in the ceiling directly above the coffin, striking you squarely in the chest.

Pure white satin padding makes lying in this claustrophobic box a bit more inviting than you would otherwise imagine. A shaft of pale silver starlight streams through a small hole in the ceiling directly above the coffin, striking you squarely in the chest.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Guard's Chamber
node.description: A massive weapons rack lies pushed up against the north wall, piled high with pole-arm weapons. A great iron bell hangs from the ceiling, an alarm in times of need. A spare stick cot has been erected off in the corner.

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Guard's Chamber
node.description: Shelves full of swords, maces, and other small weapons cover the dark stone walls. A spare stick cot lies in an out-of-the way corner, surrounded by racks of plate and chain armor.

node.name: Abyssal Nether, Maelshyve's Remnant
node.description: The coiling helix of fused bone ends here, dropping off into the abyss. Cradled in the clawlike comfort of the path's edge is a great black shell, cracked open like an egg. From within, an endless river of midnight-blue sludge pours out, streaming into the endless darkness below.

Cradled in the clawlike comfort of the path's edge is a great black shell, cracked open like an egg. From within, an endless river of midnight-blue sludge pours out, streaming into the endless darkness below.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: Blackness encroaches like a hungry cloud, choking visibility. What light is not consumed is candid in its revelations. Twisted, chewed, and mangled bones are loosely arranged to form a path, gathered from every sort of creature and fused in several creative ways. Discernible shapes -- skulls, claws, ribs and hands -- protrude from unidentifiable appendages.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: From this vantage more of the bone construct can be viewed. Arising from the abyss like a giant coiled adder, and held aloft by no discernible force, it swirls high above you in the dark shadows. A heavy silence is broken by the crunch of bone fragments underfoot.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The path shifts like a tiny vessel in a stormy sea, threatening to toss all aboard into the deadly inkiness keeping it afloat. A skull near the edge of the path lays with its mouth open and sockets empty, grinning smugly and perhaps waiting to be entertained by a dramatic fall.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The bones making up the path grow alternately smooth and jagged, some jutting outward like angry brambles, while others are deceptively unblemished. The smallest bones are thin and brittle, snapping loudly in the darkness when broken.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: This bone pathway resonates with any application of pressure, emitting crunches and creaks as it sways above a dark emptiness so complete that there are no echoes. Occasionally amidst the cacophony, something resembling a plaintive cry rises up, a haunting wail of sound that thuds dully against the shifting bones.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: Darkness enshrouds this gruesome spiral like a heinous mother nurturing its demon child. Occasional wind currents cause the huge construct to sway ominously, promising death if it collapses and plummets into the empty abyss below.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The bones making up the path intertwine in a jumbled matrix, coiling like dry white rope. Arms and legs bend at odd and painful angles, locking together to form a treacherous but passable roadway. Below, only blackness can be seen.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: From somewhere high above, a faint light filters down through the construct. This feeble illumination shines dully through a hole in one particular skull, causing the empty eye sockets to cast bizarre shadows onto the pathway.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: It almost appears that the skeletons lining the pathway have been consumed by the heinous spiral. Only the skulls remain, lining the pathway like boulders cast along the side of a hellish road. Vacant eye sockets stare blindly at one another with gaping jaws frozen open -- locked forever in an endless silent scream.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The collection of bones here is sparse, creating large holes where pieces have broken off. Several of the broken fragments swing precariously within the unobstructed gaps, clacking ghoulishly against each other and creating a disturbing melody that echoes throughout the darkness.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: An odd assortment of small bones has been fused curiously together, in a manner that causes the jagged edges to partially obstruct the pathway and slow passage. Some of the spiked tips grip pieces of shredded cloth and fur, perhaps giving mute testimony that this strategy has been successful.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: A lone skeletal hand dangles limply over the edge of the bone structure -- fishing for hope in the darkness, perhaps. A strange clear liquid drips from its bony fingers, glistening eerily in the scant light.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The bone path here forms a concave structure, creating a hollow 'U' shape that provides some adventitious guardrails. On the outside of the path, the blackness is startlingly mouth-like. It seems eager to swallow the path, consuming it into nonexistence.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: Shattered fragments, a sad testament to once living creatures, now cover this vile pathway. Random piles of these dissimilar bones are littered throughout the area, stacked unevenly to form small rounded towers.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The stench of decay hangs heavily over the area, despite the distinct lack of rotting flesh. Tiny pieces of bone are randomly scattered everywhere, as if the hand of death had thrown them in a macabre game.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The bone path is yellowed in places, with grime caked in the numerous nooks and crannies formed by the interlocking vertebrae. A fatty substance leaks from some of the older bones, soundlessly bleeding into the surrounding hollowness. In a corner near the edge of the road the bones look gnawed, as if some starving being sought nourishment from the oily substance.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The bones of the path groan, shifting slightly in the noxious, breathy wind that courses through the area. One distorted ribcage has taken on a kite-like appearance, bones caved outward in an effort to catch a passing breeze and fly away from this place.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: A precarious shelf of bone juts out over the dark abyss. From this vantage, the faint outline of the macabre pathway can be seen coiling indefinitely into the inky blackness above.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The path continues to wind its dangerous spiral, disappearing into the darkness. A shattered skull, missing an eye and half of its cranium, lies in the center of the path, grinning stupidly.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The passageway narrows, forming a treacherous path over the darkness below. Two nearby skeletons lay at odd angles, their hands locked in each other's grasp. It seems that even death could not separate the pair.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The flesh-stripped bones are broken and fragmented, with sharp jagged edges. Huge black spiders with oddly distended bellies scramble up and over the shattered pieces, spinning tight webs inside some of the larger hollow shafts.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: Oddly, fused bones form a strange skeleton resting near the northern section of the path. It appears that the skeletal remains from several creatures have been gruesomely attached to each other, to create this abominable roadside sentinel.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The path twists and turns upwards in a northeasterly direction, hiding calcified bones in the murky darkness. Occasional sharp cracks jar the stillness, as gravity takes it toll on the brittle skeletal fragments. The sound echoes down the bone path, galloping like a ghostly caravan racing down a disembodied spine.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: A large bone, possibly a Gor'Tog fibula, protrudes dangerously from the center of the pathway and threatens to eviscerate unwary passersby. Skeletons lining both sides of the walkway seem to pay silent tribute to this gruesome obstruction.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: A partially formed bone golem rises ominously from the pathway, its torso mysteriously imbedded in the ground beneath it. The creature's deep hollow eye sockets face downwards, their intent unfathomable.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The bones near the edge of the path have snapped, their jagged edges jutting outwards, slashing at the darkness. Occasional drafts waft through the hollow tubes, causing ghostly whispers that echo ominously throughout the area -- a warning perhaps?

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The sense of abandonment is palpable. From this vantage point, much of the bone-path below is visible. The road seems distant, unreal, as if were more suggestion than reality.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: Shattered skeletons lay scattered in a multitude of broken piles, teeth torn from skulls and limbs from torsos. Nebulous shadows coldly envelop the splintered pieces like a heinous spirit devouring a conquered soul.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: Large areas of the path have completely fallen away, leaving dangerous gaps in the roadway. Occasional scraps of rotted cloth cling desperately to skeletal remains, adding gruesome splotches of color to the morbid setting.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The passageway narrows, becoming tunnel-like -- walls with curving, yellow ivory that is oddly rippled. Closer inspection reveals the unusual curvatures to be ribs from all manner of creatures. Many of the bones are splintered and spiked in tight clusters which encroach upon a trespasser's passage.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: A skeleton dangling from a rotting cape hangs limply over the side of the path, its toes testing imaginary water. Hollow eye sockets seem to keep watch over the massive spiraling walkway.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: An impossible convolution of bones awaits above, a massive pathway that coils unendingly into the inky blackness. Below, the trail continues in a downwards spiral of decaying skeletal morsels.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: Ghostly tendrils of light filter through the area, casting ominous shadows on the pathway of skeletal fragments. The ground is scattered with moldy crushed bone that makes sinister noises when walked upon.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: The path widens here. Families of skeletons congregate, their interlocked rib cages forming a bizarre guardrail that protects the northeastern edge of the path. Below, the darkness is fluid, hungrily lapping at the visibility.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: Dimness cloaks this space and its nightmarish desolation threatens the senses. Overhead is a giant, twirling mass of bones, suspended in mid-air. An occasional draft creates eerie clanking sounds as bones rattle against each other.

node.name: Abyss, Maelshyve's Ascent
node.description: A massive construct of fused bone swirls into the abyss below, held aloft by no tangible force. It simply floats in the emptiness, like the contorted spine of the World Dragon. It is clear that this is no remnant of a single beast -- the ground is formed of bones of all shapes and sizes, from all manner of beasts, fused together by some mysterious feat.

node.name: Maelshyve's Ascent, Summit
node.description: The great helix's upper boundary ends here, a wicked collection of bone spires stabbing blindly into the darkness above. Held captive amongst them, an empty throne of brilliant blood-red crystal beckons. Below, the path of bone descends into a seemingly unending spiral into the darkness.

node.description: Barren of leaves, wretched trees loom up from the tall grass looking a great deal like upturned claws. A somber mist perpetually hangs in the air, dampening your lungs with its weight.
Irregular patches of tall grass and squat shrubs lie beneath a sinuous blanket of dark purple mist. The twisted shadow of an occasional barren tree looms in the foggy distance.
Sinuous tendrils of dark purple mist swim through the air, entangling themselves in the deformed limbs of barren trees like ethereal serpents. The dusky scent of nightshade carries over the moor.
Sharp shadows cut through the landscape, accenting the twisted silhouettes of the grotesquely haggard trees while concealing the hazards that lie hidden within the patches of tall grass.
Swaths of dark mist drape the moor in layers of shadow, concealing the source of a malignant rustling that waits in nearby tangles of nightshade.

Tall grasses sway under the ebb and flow of the dark purple mists, kissing the verdant blades with icy dew. Patches of colorful nightshade bloom amidst the grasses, a beautiful yet deadly addition to this dark, wild garden.
Tendrils of blooming nightshade climb high through the dark mists into the vacant claw-like trees, appearing to give the deceased husks some semblance of life, however perverted.
The dark mists cast a bluish-lavender pall through the air. The motion of every shadow is magnified, twitching in wait just beyond your field of vision.

The dusky scent of nightshade seems to manifest visually as the rolling, dark mists that are omnipresent over the wild moor. The grasses waver in a lilting motion, enchanted by the intoxicating aroma.
The soft mist makes everything seem muted and far away, disconnected and tinged with the illusion of a dream world.

node.name: Prairie, Wylder Spring
node.description: Someone built a small platform halfway up the tree. From this vantage, the distant walls of Shard can be seen to the west, surrounded by a seemingly endless sea of undulating green and gold.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Dead End
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. The path bends sharply around a corner and reaches a dead end.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. A deeper darkness against the silver-scattered black of the sky, arches and columns of time-worn stone rise up like silent sentinels in the night.

Fantastic arches and pillars of ruddy sandstone, formed over centuries by the slow work of wind and water, loom silently on either side of the narrow track. The passing wind sings eerily through the stone.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. Eastward the cliffs taper off and more of the night sky is visible.
Canyons twist and turn through the colorful bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. The cliffs taper off to the east, and the savannah can be glimpsed beyond the badlands.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Mosaic Bluffs
node.description: Huge dark shadows loom ominously to the west, blocking out part of the nighttime sky. Crickets chirp incessantly in a meandering cadence that rises and falls irregularly.

Spectacular rock formations dominate the eroded bluffs looming to the west. Vividly colored in stratified shades of tan, black, red, blue, and green, the steep cliffs and arches soar over the canyons like rainbows in the distance.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. Only the faintest glimmer of starlight reaches the floor of the canyon, making no noticeable impact on the gathered darkness. The eroded stone of the bluffs takes on the appearance of a vast shattered city dreaming in shadow.

The canyon twists unexpectedly through the bluffs in this stretch of the path, widening slightly here as it snakes its way through the maze of weather-sculpted stone. Off to one side a cairn of carefully stacked rocks and pebbles has been constructed.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Dead End
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. The path bends sharply around a corner and reaches a dead end.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. All three paths from this ravine seem equally ominous in the faint starlight, with the surrounding rock formations looming over the canyon like petrified gargoyles.
The ravine widens here and paths lead in three directions. From this angle the surrounding geological formations look curiously like heads and faces engaged in an animated conversation.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Grey-barked desert ironwood trees shine with a faint silvery gleam in the starlight, clear white blossoms picking up and reflecting the milky hues until they glow like stained glass images. Faint splashes disturb the mirror-like smoothness of the spring, sending light sparkling across the surface of the water.

Several desert ironwood trees with smooth grey bark and glossy green leaves huddle around a small natural spring. A rich, spicy fragrance emanates from white blossoms growing singly on elongated stems while some fallen flowers float serenely in the placid water of the spring.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: A colony of prairie dogs inhabits this broad valley between low bluffs. Their quiet chittering sounds are interspersed with occasional sharp barks.

A colony of prairie dogs inhabits this broad valley between low bluffs. With quick darting movements, they take turns poking their golden brown heads out of their burrows and looking about with bright eyes. Their chittering and barking oscillates in an intermittent rhythm.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. Near a stand of cottonwood trees the ground is alive with the movements of hundreds of red ants, tireless in their busy work.

Obstinately clinging to life, a cluster of gnarled cottonwood trees line the bed of an all but vanished stream. A passing breeze rustles their leaves, exposing their silvery undersides to gleam in the light. Dozens of small mounds near the roots of the trees swarm with red ants, moving quickly and purposefully about the canyon walls and floor.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu.

Wind moans through the stark canyons and stone columns, the sound lonely and desolate. Seemingly familiar sights, smells and sounds in this maze of canyons confound the senses with their disorganized patterns and could easily lead an inattentive wanderer astray.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. The chasm narrows unexpectedly, with the high cliffs closing in on the canyon floor. Only a small patch of the night sky is visible beyond the steep walls.
The chasm twists and narrows unexpectedly, the high cliffs closing in on the canyon floor. Only a small patch of sky is visible beyond the steep walls.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. A row of stunted trees is the likely source of the leaves that crunch underfoot.

Gnarled trees line the path in a row here, the handiwork of a passing traveler or nature's plan unknown. Five-pointed leaves are scattered amongst the rubble of fallen rocks, their fading color dusted with the blue silt of an eroding stratum on the cliff above.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. The dark line of a ledge leads up the north wall of the canyon.
A long precarious ledge angles sharply down the northern wall of the canyon, dwindling as it descends. Small holes chipped in the unforgiving granite above the ledge are worn smooth from use.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, On the Ledge
node.description: A narrow ledge ascending steeply from the canyon floor culminates at a dark vertical crevice that splits the thick granite wall. Small smooth holes are carved into the face of the cliff above the ledge.

A narrow ledge ascending steeply from the canyon floor culminates at a dark vertical crevice that splits the thick granite wall, its depth indeterminable without closer inspection. Small smooth holes are carved into the face of the cliff above the ledge.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Cavern
node.description: A musty smell permeates this dark cavern. Discarded rags lie along one wall, riddled with holes and infested with bugs. The only way out is back through the crevice.
It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!
A musty smell permeates this dark cavern. Discarded rags lie along one wall, riddled with holes and infested with bugs. Daylight is visible through a large vertical crevice in the granite.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. A light, flowery scent wafts from the vague outline of a wizened tree.

A lone dogwood tree grows here, its white and red petals unexpectedly bright against the muted background of sand and silt at the bottom of the canyon. A light, flowery scent wafts from the wizened tree. Animal tracks mark the ground near the tree, evidence that these canyons are not as uninhabited as they appear.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. Upon closer scrutiny, a deeper gloom near the base of the cliff proves to be simply a large boulder. A steep crumbling cliff rises to the east.

A large misshapen boulder lies near the canyon wall, its shadow a cool resting spot for the lizards that can occasionally be spotted bobbing their heads up and down. Near the rock, a small group of cacti thrive in the dry canyon bed. A steep crumbling cliff rises to the east.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. To the northeast rises a steep crumbling cliff.

To the northeast, thick reddish dust floats down from a crumbling cliff, covering everything from the muted vegetation to the sloping mass of rock debris on the canyon floor. A small hole choked with the ochre dirt is barely visible in the ground, the abandoned den of some small animal.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, On the Cliff
node.description: The crumbling rock on the face of this steep cliff is extremely unstable. Clinging precariously in the dark, your slightest movement causes small avalanches of rocks and soil to go careening down the bluff.
The crumbling rock on the face of this steep cliff is extremely unstable. Clinging precariously, your slightest movement causes small avalanches of rocks and soil to go careening down the bluff.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Atop the Mesa
node.description: Atop this wide mesa the shapes of some of the most prominent geological formations to the north and west are visible even in the dark. With overhanging cliffs around most of the plateau, the only way down is an unstable, crumbling cliff on the south side.

The top of this mesa is broad and flat, offering spectacular views of the varied rock formations and surrounding savannah. With overhanging cliffs around most of the plateau, the only way down is an unstable, crumbling cliff on the south side.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Atop the Mesa
node.description: From this lofty summit, shadows darker than the night loom in fantastic shapes to the north and west. The mesa slopes slightly downward to the west.

From this lofty summit, the maze of canyons and striated cliffs to the north and west spreads out in a colorful panorama. The overhanging cliffs effectively prevent descent from this side of the mesa, which slopes slightly downward to the west.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu.

The crumbling canyon walls are bolstered in places by twisted and dwarfed trees that cling tenaciously to the nearly vertical surfaces. Tiny birds flutter in and out of a small hole near one tree, the avian family choosing to make their home in solid rock rather than in the tortured vegetation.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Dead End
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. The path bends sharply around a corner and reaches a dead end.
Convoluted limbs shaped like skeletal arms extend into the narrowing canyon, grasping at passersby. The path twists and turns until it reaches a dead end.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Dead End
node.description: Canyons twist and turn through the shadowy bluffs and peaks, creating a disorienting sense of deja vu. The path bends sharply around a corner and reaches a dead end.
Convoluted limbs shaped like skeletal arms extend into the narrowing canyon, grasping at passersby. The path twists and turns until it reaches a dead end.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Mosaic Bluffs
node.description: Huge dark shadows loom ominously to the north, blocking out part of the nighttime sky. Nearby, small patches of rock nettle and purple star thistle rustle in the breeze.

Named for their vividly colored layers of soil and minerals, the heavily eroded Mosaic Bluffs loom to the north. From the muted hues of dun sandstone and dark charcoal to brighter strata of red, blue, and green, the steep cliffs form a harmonious chiaroscuro of light and dark. Scattered patches of rock nettle and purple star thistle quiver with each breezy gust of wind.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Canyon Floor
node.description: A precipitous escarpment rises directly off the canyon floor and up into the night sky. A collection of dirt and rubble lies at the bottom of the cliff.
A precipitous escarpment rises directly off the canyon floor and up into the sky, tapering into a crooked spire high above. A collection of dirt and rubble lies at the bottom of the cliff.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, On the Escarpment
node.description: There is no obvious route to follow in climbing up and down the escarpment. Explorers must move back and forth, finding precarious handholds wherever they can.
In the dark it is exceptionally dangerous to attempt to climb this escarpment, as it is almost impossible to find handholds.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Atop the Escarpment
node.description: The escarpment narrows into a rocky slope leading to a crooked spire that thrusts eerily toward the sky. A singular collection of stones at the base of a stunted tree looks deliberate and purposeful in an otherwise disorganized landscape of broken rocks and rubble.
The escarpment narrows into a rocky slope leading to a crooked spire that thrusts eerily toward the night sky. A stunted oak tree grows amidst the broken rocks and rubble.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Base of the Spire
node.description: The rocky slope of the escarpment ends at an immense spire towering asymmetrically overhead. At the base of the spire, some old bones document the untimely demise of unfortunate climbers.
The rocky slope of the escarpment ends at an immense spire blocking out an irregular swatch of the nighttime sky.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, On the Spire
node.description: The spire twists and turns perversely, while the incessant wind makes the laborious climb even more formidable.
The spire twists and turns perversely, while the darkness and the incessant wind make the laborious climb even more formidable.

node.name: Remcli Amarcen, Atop the Spire
node.description: Towering over the surrounding bluffs and grasslands, this windswept spire provides a breathtaking view for any adventurers brave and agile enough to surmount it.
Towering over the surrounding bluffs and grasslands, this windswept spire is the highest point around for many miles.

node.name: Waystation, Ylono's Repairs
node.description: Feeble light from an ancient lantern does little to lessen the shadows filling the corners of the repair shop. Ylono huddles behind a rickety wooden table covered with scraps of leather used for his repairs. A smoke-stained banner hung from the rafters proudly proclaims, "Best Repairs in Elanthia!"

node.name: Abyssal Seed, Monks' Quarters
node.description: Ten cedar-framed cots line the walls of this moderate-sized room. A simple woven-reed prayer rug mediates the harsh stone floor in the center of the room.

node.name: Mountain Road
node.description: The great round bulk of the Fortress of Chyolvea Tayeu'a squats atop the mountain peak. Its smooth black surface is stained by weather, but not scarred by wear or war. The great almhara doors, almost large enough to admit a Dragon, stand open just wide enough to pass through, splitting their inlaid silver eye-in-triskele symbol down the center.

node.name: Mountain Road
node.description: The road jinks around a tight switchback that siege engines and battering rams would find very troublesome. It also offers an incomparable panoramic view of the valley below Chyolvea Tayeu'a.

node.name: Mountain Road, Dead End
node.description: The road's progress down the mountain is abruptly halted by a yawning chasm. Ancient war machines, long ago foiled by the avalanche that destroyed the road, lie rusting and forsaken on the other side of the gap.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Duty
node.description: A narrow shaft of sunlight blazes through the narrow opening between a pair of massive almhara doors. It pierces the gloom of this wide, curving hall, illuminating the closely set polished black stones of the floor.

Pale starlight is visible through a narrow opening between the massive almhara doors that once served as the main entrance to the fortress. Torchlight flickers farther down the hall and reflects off the highly polished stones of the wall and floor.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Duty
node.description: A few flickering torches in their sconces provide plenty of ambience, but barely enough light to see by. However, they nicely highlight the silver eye-in-triskele insignia inlaid in the unusually wide stone door set in the southwestern wall.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Duty
node.description: Cheery bright light pours into the hall through the open doors of the chapel. It glints off the polished stones of the floor, set at slight angles so that they cleverly form a subtle mosaic of the face of Meraud.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Duty
node.description: The great hallway widens and rises slightly as it curves gracefully toward the center of the citadel. The almhara walls are hung with the banners of lesser cities and minor nobility.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Artificer's Workroom
node.description: A single oil lamp burns low in this untidy workroom. Odd shapes loom in dark corners, and bits of twisted copper and glass are strewn across the scarred oaken countertop. Zharlest, the aged and dozing S'Kra proprietor, seems to take no notice of the mess nor of his potential customers.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Chamber of All
node.description: The heart of the Citadel, the Chamber of All is an immense circular courtyard surrounded by the stone walls of the three Halls. White gravel and red brick walkways surround an open-air amphitheater, providing a place to relax away from the gloomy black hallways. A steep stone staircase leads up to a private balcony which is lined with the standards and banners of countless nations, most long fallen to dust.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Power
node.description: Light from the Chamber of All slightly illuminates this portion of the hallway, reflecting off a silver plaque set above the entrance to the Warrior Mage Guildhall. A small lizard pokes its head out from a crack between two stones, watching what transpires.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Power
node.description: The curving stone hallway is shrouded in muffled darkness, broken only by a faint light to the west. Torch sconces line the almhara walls, waiting to be lit.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Office
node.description: Though the main features of the office are a simple and functional ebonwood desk and chair, the beige carpet, light deobar paneling, and numerous lanterns give the room a sense of luxury in contrast to the rest of the fortress. A small stone fireplace set in the wall opposite the desk keeps the room comfortably warm.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Barracks
node.description: The barracks hall is filled with row upon row of empty cots, each one with a little chest at the end for storing personal items. A few mages have set their familiars to guard their belongings.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Power
node.description: Light coming through the open infirmary door barely illuminates the hallway, casting the well of the curving stone staircase into deep shadow. The silver inlay of an almhara plaque above the door catches the light, shining in defiance of the gloom.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Infirmary
node.description: Every inch of black stone in the infirmary has been covered in pearlescent white tile. A score of torches blaze brightly from sconces set about the walls, filling the room with a cheery light. Though busy tending the myriad wounds of the residents of the citadel, Healer Elys takes time to acknowledge your presence with a polite nod.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Power
node.description: Torchlight plays across an intricate spiderweb near the ceiling. The web echoes the shape of a series of cracks which radiate out from a central point in the hall floor, as if something heavy had been dropped on it from a great height.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Death
node.description: Guards walk the hallways with hands on the hilts of their weapons, their eyes casting suspicious glances in every direction. Their gazes occasionally drift to a large eye-in-triskele symbol etched upon the wall opposite a narrow corridor, but never dwell on it.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Winding Staircase
node.description: Made from thirty-six slabs of almhara, the staircase forms a tight spiral that leads to a balcony overhead. Some of the slabs are badly cracked and canted at odd angles.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Guildmaster's Balcony
node.description: The balcony features the graceful winged buttresses and angelic friezes of Celestial Elven architecture, in contrast to the ponderous darkness of the rest of the fortress. It overlooks the amphitheater, allowing whoever stands here to overhear what is said. Five of the world's most priceless artifacts and works of art are set about the balcony, each on an individual stone pedestal.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Mess Hall
node.description: Rows of tables and benches are arranged to seat hundreds. Designed to feed them all with speed and efficiency, the kitchen, run by a stern Halfling, is larger than the public rooms of many inns. Warm air from the ovens issues from a vent in the wall near the floor, barely adequate to heat the large room.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Death
node.description: The black almhara stone hallway curves slightly here, leading off into shrouded darkness. Patches of glowing moss are growing on the northern wall, barely providing enough light to see by. A black onyx archway, a deeper shadow against the black wall, leads to the fortress's credit union.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Death
node.description: Pale light filters into the gloomy hall from below a narrow door on the eastern wall. A large black rat sits across from the door, its beady eyes reflecting the light into twin pinpoints of fire.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Hall of Death
node.description: The Hall of Death ends here, the curving almhara hallway stopping abruptly at a blank wall. A small crack in the ceiling has allowed rainwater to drip through, collecting into a small pool of clear water, which is glowing softly.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Credit Union
node.description: The credit union is furnished in expensive silk rugs and imported Elven tapestries. Smokeless white candles ring the chamber, looking nice but providing very little light. A S'kra guard dips some throwing darts in poison vials, keeping one eye on his task and one eye on the people in the lobby.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Exchange
node.description: The currency exchange is little more than a blank stone room with a large counter and a steel-barred window. An Elf with bloodshot eyes minds the counter, yawning occasionally.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Teller
node.description: A marble counter holds a row of teller windows which are all closed save one. This window is manned by a frazzled Elothean girl who looks ready to rip the head off of the next person to bother her. Customers in the long line grumble to each other about the lack of service.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Security Checkpoint
node.description: A stony-faced sentry stands at attention besides a silvery arch with the word Setheral inscribed above it. Torches blaze brightly from sconces set in the walls.

node.name: Marachek's Oak, Trader Outpost
node.description: Boxes, crates, sacks, packages and baskets float effortlessly in and out of the room. Only upon disposal are their small, sturdy, efficient Halfling porters revealed, slightly winded but grinning broadly. The room itself is a transit point for the rapid purchase and sale of bulk goods by Guild members. A coolly efficient Halfling trade minister expedites member transactions with a wave of his quill pen and a click of his abacus mind, charting all fees owed, all monies paid.

node.name: Fayrin's Rest, Trader Pit
node.description: On this sunken, earth-packed floor, shouting Halfling clerks scramble and collide, waving freshly inked receipts before throwing them down on the pine desk. They cater to the demands of merchants staring at the boards like frenzied spectators at a bear baiting.

node.name: Marachek's Oak, Trader Caravan Stables
node.description: In this large, pleasantly airy room, industrious Halflings muck out straw-lined stables, fill water troughs and towel down sturdy pack animals around the clock. Their overseer glances in occasionally to make certain everything is going along nicely, then pops out for his nonstop cardgame of tableen down at Marachek's Oak.

node.name: Marachek's Oak, Secluded Booth
node.description: This corner of the Feasterie lies behind a towering shank of barbequed boar meat. Not surprisingly, it is the only spot in the place out of the glare of bright lights, gleaming Halfling smiles and endless offers of service. It is even possible to carry on a quiet conversation here, accompanied only by the sizzle of steaming food and the subdued hum of pearlflies on the windowsill.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Chapel of a Hundred Faiths
node.description: Thousands of votive candles illuminate nearly a hundred portraits, icons, and statuettes of various gods and saints, ranging from the familiar Immortals and their aspects to the completely unrecognizable. About a third of the images are insectoid in nature.

node.name: Tunnel
node.description: This sloping tunnel is just high and wide enough for a Kaldar to walk through comfortably. The upper end terminates in a jagged hole covered at the other side by a dark silk tapestry. A few long-burning candles with a strong vanilla aroma struggle to overpower the foul odor wafting up from below.

node.name: Tunnel
node.description: The surfaces of the tunnel are smooth and glassy as if covered in ice, yet the air is warm and damp. Although the floor is a little slick, a cautious traveler can easily make his way up or down the gentle slope. A strong stench permeates the air, particularly near the lower end of the passage.

node.name: Reeking Pit
node.description: Corpses of all shapes and sizes are stacked like cordwood in this sunless stone vault. The staggering odor, not the stench of rotting flesh that one would expect, seems to be coming from a sticky acidic residue covering everything. Dog-sized insects move about the cave, spraying more of the substance about and keeping the inventory in order.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Amphitheater
node.description: The lush green grass floor of the amphitheater, slightly tiered to provide adequate seating, slopes gently down to the center. There, like the pupil of an eye, a massive orator's stone rests. The sloping ground creates natural acoustics that allow a speaker to be heard by all in the chamber.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Warrior Mage Guild
node.description: A large Guild crest is hung upon the northeastern wall, opposite a black ironwood door which leads to the Guild library. Resting near the Guildmaster, a small stand bears the guild register, Augrym's spellbook and an oil lamp.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Workroom
node.description: The Guild workroom is a jumble of equipment and ingredients that range from the boring mundane to complicated contraptions of glass and metal. An area has been cleared in the center of the room for magical experiments, and the faint powder residue of a spell-circle can be seen surrounding the area. One of the ever-present eye-in-triskele symbols has been inlaid on the ceiling of the workroom.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Library
node.description: The walls of the library are hung with silk tapestries depicting figures and events from Elanthian history. A large ebonwood bookcase rests against the northern wall, filled with moldering books and brittle, yellowed scrolls.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Stone Tower
node.description: The ancient tower is formed of the same inky black almhara stone as the rest of the fortress. A circular stone staircase winds upwards to a crystal observation dome, and down to the main halls of the citadel.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Observation Dome
node.description: The smoothly curved crystal dome arcs high overhead. While it was intended for use in studying the heavens, the clear dome also provides a breathtaking view of the mountains and valleys surrounding Chyolvea Tayeu'a. A black almhara staircase leads downward to the main halls of the fortress.

node.name: Chyolvea Tayeu'a, Rooftop
node.description: The tiles of the roof are formed of a polished, inky black stone that resonates with magical energy. The fortress spreads out below like a coin stamped with a triskele seal, although the view is partially obstructed by the crystal-domed observatory tower. The open area known as the Chamber of All, in the center of the citadel, resembles a glaring eye.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Jegu Kai'avren
node.description: Wagons clatter over reddish granite cobblestones as traders go about their business. A low stone well stands in a grassy circle at the center of the intersection, surrounded by wooden homes with brightly painted shutters. A shy young maid peers down from a nearby balcony, but ducks quickly back out of sight with a flutter of skirts.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Jegu Kai'avren
node.description: Shady deobar trees line the road, spreading their limbs like a canopy over travelers. A tantalizing aroma of onions baking slowly with a joint of beef wafts from a nearby home. Outside another home, a child's wooden practice sword clamped in a vise awaits the finishing touches from the woodworker.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Jegu Kai'avren
node.description: Fragrant roses twine along a white lattice arch over the entrance to a nearby home, the deep red blossoms contrasting with the dark green paint on the door and shutters. A rain barrel sits beside the door, arranged to catch the water which rolls off the home's roof tiles.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Jegu Kai'avren
node.description: A low stone wall runs beside the road, the stark outline softened by scattered clumps of moss which cling to the mortar. A gutter runs beneath it, allowing rainwater to drain away instead of forming pools in the street.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Jegu Kai'avren
node.description: The wind catches at a loose shutter, sending it banging against the house. The once-vivid red paint has faded to a soft rose over the years, a distinct contrast to the well-kept appearance of the surrounding homes. A splash of the original scarlet paint is revealed where the knocker has been removed from the door. Evidently that particular house has been vacant for some time.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Jegu Kai'avren
node.description: Vivid yellow shalyria blossoms twine along a brick chimney, the fragrant flowers filling the air with a sweet scent to delight the senses. A housewife has planted an herb garden beside her door, surrounded by a lattice fence to keep away the local dogs. Lavender, fennel, thyme, marjoram... these are but a few of the culinary herbs which grow in the neatly tended beds.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Jegu Kai'avren
node.description: The sandy square is empty now, occupied only by the lobsided wooden pells used to teach children their beginning lessons in swordwork. During the day, the yard bustles with activity, but at night all is quiet and serene.

Children practice sword work, swinging at wooden pells in a sandy square under the watchful eye of a retired mercenary. The woman's missing leg makes her unable to sustain an offensive rush, yet her graceful movements and quick reflexes combined with her patient explanations make her a perfect teacher of the young.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Jegu Kai'avren
node.description: A pear tree stands within a nearby brick-walled garden, the branches reaching out toward the street. Wooden crates lie beneath the tree, half-filled with the year's bounty. These crates will soon find their way to the root cellar to become pies or preserves under the skilled hands of the housewife.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Jegu Kai'avren
node.description: A child's doll lies discarded in a gutter by the side of the road, the rag-stuffed body soaked with water, and one button eye broken in half. A trickle of water flows through the ditch, swirling around one sodden leg before running off into the distance.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Trader Outpost
node.description: A master trader sips tea and chats with the shipping clerk, keeping a watchful eye on her apprentices as they bustle about the tiled floors of the outpost loading trade goods upon her caravan. Both women ignore the loud voice of a local blacksmith as he argues with the commerce minister over the price of iron ore. The minister listens calmly, then raises the price on the ore by fifty dokoras, seemingly oblivious to the smith's outraged bellow of protest.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Stable
node.description: Thick walls of mortared fieldstone dance with wavering light from tin-backed lanterns perched at intervals along the walls. A thick bed of fresh straw insulates the cool stone of the floor and muffles the footfalls of both rider and beast.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Stable
node.description: Rough wood-sided stalls stand side by side like attentive soldiers, their edges chewed to uneven scallops by previous boarders. Assorted pieces of worn or broken tack hang on hooks about the walls awaiting the skilled hand of the leather worker to give them new life.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Granary
node.description: Bins of weathered grey wood line the walls, their contents protected by solid lids fastened with stout iron locks. Trickles of grain trail from worn and chewed corners, betraying the persistent assault upon their contents by resident mice and rats.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Quintan's Leather
node.description: The smell of buffed leather hangs thick in the air, mingling with the mixed aromas of the stable. Tools of all shapes and sizes hang on nails and hooks on the walls in this makeshift workspace, while bits of leather and rope cover the floor. The mess builds up around a horse-shaped armor stand that sits against one wall, bearing the weight of several scarred pieces.

node.name: Steelclaw Clan, Training Yard
node.description: Shrouded in shadow, the training yard looms with unseen obstacles. Faint detail appears if one looks closely.

node.name: Motte Forge, Supplies
node.description: Blasting hellish heat followed by the ringing of anvils greets adventurers bold enough to enter the shack. The air hangs heavy with the acrid scent of burning coal and melting steel. A sweating Dwarven attendant leans against the far wall, next to a leather flap leading to the business end of the structure.

node.name: Crystal Shore, Sparkling Sands
node.description: The quiet lakeside retreat is sheltered from the trade road by a small grove of copperleaf trees. Softly glowing gaethzen orbs edge the wide gravel path, reflected as ghostly apparitions in the gloomy waters. The city of Shard blazes on the southern horizon, bursting with activity throughout the night.

The quiet lakeside retreat is sheltered from the bustle of the trade road by a small grove of copperleaf trees. Crystal-white sands extend from the placid lake to the edge of the wide gravel path, their radiance barely outdone by the distant walls of Shard towering over the heart of the lake. Softly glowing gaethzen orbs dangle from the nearby branches, reflected like miniature suns in the rippling waters.

node.name: Crystal Shore, Sparkling Sands
node.description: Gaethzen orbs illuminate the gravel path, their light glittering off the nearby sand. Dim reflections of each orb float over the dark, calm waters. A pair of marble benches rests along the gravel path in a position to look out over the lake.

Crystalline grains glitter in the daylight, a prismatic display of colors stretching from the gravel path to the shore. Calm, blue waters fill the lake, with tiny ripples lapping softly at the sandy edge. A pair of marble benches underneath some dangling gaethzen orbs rests alongside the gravel path in a position to look out over the lake.

node.name: Crystal Shore, Sparkling Sands
node.description: Radiant gaethzen orbs halo a statue of Ferdahl Kukalakai, positioned in the center of a cluster of lakeside villas so she can continue her eternal vigil over all of Ilithi. The light casts a shadowed silhouette that stretches over the trees and lake, as if she was reaching for her lost home.

Close to the path stands a lifesculpted statue of Ferdahl Kukalakai haloed by a ring of gaethzen orbs hovering from copperleaf tree branches. She watches eternally over the tranquil waters of her city, a force for peace in death as she was in life. The surrounding villas nestle in the iridescent sand along the lake as if taking comfort in her serene presence.

node.name: Crystal Shore, Sparkling Sands
node.description: The path cuts particularly close to the water as it traverses a grassy rise. A large willow tree growing from the hill leans out over the lake. The faint lighting from the gaethzen orbs causes the tree's slender branches to form tendrils of shadows that ooze across the lake's mirrored surface.

A grass-covered rise on the shore supports a large willow tree that leans out over the waters. Many years of erosion have taken their toll on the roots, but the drooping branches still manage to extend over the path as it cuts by the lake shore. Small gaethzen orbs dangle between the rustling leaves like will-o'-the-wisps caught in a spider's web.

node.name: Crystal Shore, Sparkling Sands
node.description: Bright gaethzen orbs light the shore path, though the illumination ends before reaching a shadow-cloaked pier extending over the waters. Carefully shielded by the surrounding foliage, a dim clearing contains a silverwood telescope mounted on a marble pedestal. Nearby, the villas and their residents enjoy a grand view of the nightscape beyond the lake.

The wide gravel path curves along the shore to end at a white crystalline pier that extends over the waters. Smooth gaethzen orbs encircle a small clearing centered around a silverwood telescope mounted on a marble pedestal. Nearby, the villas and their residents enjoy a grand view of the beach, lake and cityscape beyond.

node.name: Catherine's Court, Cloisters
node.description: The ambient evening light seems to rain down a blooming waterfall of pale starflowers that grow on the walls of the house. Light dances across the grassy garden from oil lanterns set along a stone balustrade, illuminating ornate stone benches set beneath arched trellises of twisted grapevines.

The tall limestone and half-timbered walls of the house enclose three sides of the grassy cloister, while a stone balustrade twined with ivy borders the northern side. Grotesque faces carved into the wooden corbels supporting the second story peer down amid the closed white starflowers creeping up the walls. Stone benches inset with lead friezes sit below arched trellises of twisted grapevines.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: Tall pillars of dark granite and light sandstone support the ceiling of the grand lobby of the arena. Up a gentle incline to either side are the entrances to the east observation deck and the west observation deck, while ahead, directly between them, is a large steel archway. The crowd divides, with spectators moving up to the east or west deck, while the contestants head through the archway.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: The East Wing of the Hall of Champions stretches off into the distance. On the sandstone blocks of the outer wall, a marble half-column bears a gleaming brass lantern that lights the passageway. Across from it, on the inner wall, royal blue bunting with floral embroidery is draped above the entrances to the observation boxes.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: The East Wing of the Hall of Champions stretches off into the distance. On the sandstone blocks of the outer wall, a marble half-column bears a gleaming brass lantern that lights the passageway. Across from it, on the inner wall, royal blue bunting with floral embroidery is draped above the entrances to the observation boxes.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: The East Wing of the Hall of Champions stretches off into the distance. On the sandstone blocks of the outer wall, a half-column supports a marble basin beneath a spouting water fountain. Across from it, on the inner wall, royal blue bunting with floral embroidery fringe is draped above the entrances to the observation boxes.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: The East Wing of the Hall of Champions stretches off into the distance. On the sandstone blocks of the outer wall, a marble half-column bears a gleaming brass lantern that lights the passageway. Across from it, on the inner wall, deep red bunting with a white silk fringe is draped above the entrances to the observation boxes.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: The East Wing of the Hall of Champions stretches off into the distance. On the sandstone blocks of the outer wall, a marble half-column bears a gleaming brass lantern that lights the passageway. Across from it, on the inner wall, deep red bunting with a white silk fringe is draped above the entrances to the observation boxes.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Hara'jaal Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Mer'Kresh Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Ratha Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Surlaenis Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Langenfirth Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Throne City Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Muspar'i Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Hvaral Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Riverhaven Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Therenborough Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: The West Wing of the Hall of Champions stretches off into the distance. On the granite blocks of the outer wall, a marble half-column bears a gleaming brass lantern that lights the passageway. Across from it, on the inner wall, green bunting with a gold fringe is draped above the entrances to the observation boxes.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: The West Wing of the Hall of Champions stretches off into the distance. On the granite blocks of the outer wall, a marble half-column bears a gleaming brass lantern that lights the passageway. Across from it, on the inner wall, green bunting with a gold fringe is draped above the entrances to the observation boxes.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: The West Wing of the Hall of Champions stretches off into the distance. On the granite blocks of the outer wall, a half-column supports a marble basin beneath a spouting water fountain. Across from it, on the inner wall, green bunting with a gold fringe is draped above the entrances to the observation boxes.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Champions
node.description: The West Wing of the Hall of Champions stretches off into the distance. On the granite blocks of the outer wall, a marble half-column bears a gleaming brass lantern that lights the passageway. Across from it, on the inner wall, black bunting shot with silver threads is draped above the entrances to the observation boxes.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Arthe Dale Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Leth Deriel Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Observation Box
node.description: Walled on three sides and covered from the weather, the box commands an unobstructed view of the arena sands below. Two banked stone benches extend from side to side to seat visitors. Chiseled into the stone on the lintel are the words The Crossing Room.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Equipment Room
node.description: Equipment of every sort almost fills the room where warriors and mages ready themselves for their contests. Torchlight gleams on the burnished metal, and in the middle of it all, a large sign is fixed to the wall.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Temple Of Life
node.description: A fresco by a skilled artist covers one whole wall of this quiet room. A long, polished table -- or perhaps it is an altar -- occupies the wall across from the painting. The only other furniture in the room is a leather-cushioned chair.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Infirmary
node.description: Lanterns light the infirmary's whitewashed walls and a floor strewn with clean rushes. A chest of medical supplies -- bandages, bottles, jars, and smaller boxes -- stands in the center of the room next to a big wooden tub.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Battle
node.description: Three large, adjoining rooms -- here and to the east and west -- provide access through the gate to the team competition areas of the arena. Those thirsting to try their skill one-on-one head for the wings further east and west.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Battle
node.description: Sounds of booted feet echo from the stone walls as the corridor angles, following the curve of the arena outside. To the northeast lie entrances to single combat areas, while the gate leads to those parts of the field reserved for team competition.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Battle
node.description: The contestants divide here, beneath torches high on the vaulted walls whose light flickers on boisterous or reluctant faces. Those in singles matches head for the northwest corridor under the observation stands. Those relying on their comrades-in-arms head through the gate for the team areas.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Battle
node.description: The roar of the crowd and the clash of metal echo down a long, stone-walled corridor beneath the observation boxes. Along its dim recesses, the Kirmblars, the famous Blood Guard, invite the daring or foolhardy to compete in single combat and conduct them to their place of trial on the arena sands outside.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Battle
node.description: The roar of the crowd and the clash of metal echo down a long, stone-walled corridor beneath the observation boxes. Along its dim recesses, the Kirmblars, the famous Blood Guard, invite the daring or foolhardy to compete in single combat and conduct them to their place of trial on the arena sands outside.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Aleth Feas
node.description: Torches illuminate an expanse of hard-packed sand surrounded by a high fence. From out of the darkness come the cheers and curses of the crowd, invisible but noisy in the stands above.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Aleth Feas
node.description: Torches illuminate an expanse of hard-packed sand surrounded by a high fence. From out of the darkness come the cheers and curses of the crowd, invisible but noisy in the stands above.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Aleth Feas
node.description: Torches illuminate an expanse of hard-packed sand surrounded by a high fence. From out of the darkness come the cheers and curses of the crowd, invisible but noisy in the stands above.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Aleth Feas
node.description: Torches illuminate an expanse of hard-packed sand surrounded by a high fence. From out of the darkness come the cheers and curses of the crowd, invisible but noisy in the stands above.

node.description: Torches illuminate an expanse of hard-packed sand surrounded by a high fence. From out of the darkness come the cheers and curses of the crowd, invisible but noisy in the stands above.

node.name: Kirm Morzindu, Hall Of Battle
node.description: Torches illuminate an expanse of hard-packed sand surrounded by a high fence. From out of the darkness come the cheers and curses of the crowd, invisible but noisy in the stands above.
